textiles in the deep inky \"mood\" of Indigo. In=\ndigo is a natural dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. The powerfu=\nl dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable commodity to Euro=\npeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinnamon. hr=\nef=3D\"textile.html?id=3D24\"><h5>Indigo</h5></a>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"sect=\nionEnd\">The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis, is a re=\nfined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky \"mood\" of Indigo. In=\ndigo is a natural dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. The powerfu=\nl dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable commodity to Euro=\npeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinnamon. href=\n=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1212\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"P=\nermanent Link to J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Collection Video\">J Robert S=\ncott Indigo Textile Collection Video</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">Ma=\nrch 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A\t\t\t\t=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\" src=3D\"http://www.youtube.c=\nom/embed/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>=0A<p =\nstyle=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/w=\np-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\"><img class=3D\"align=\ncenter size-full wp-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo-fab-logo-websize1\" src=3D\"h=\nttp://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-=\nwebsize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=0A<div class=\n=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo is a natural dye that can be =\ntraced back to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo described the indigo industry in t=\nhe 13th Century during his exploration of Western Asia and India. The power=\nful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable commodity to Eu=\nropeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinnamon.</p>=0A<=\np>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis, is a refined =\nselection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky &#8220;mood&#8221; of Indi=\ngo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100% hand-woven silk, silk mohai=\nr, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: Symbol; mso-ascii-font-famil=\ny: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-char-ty=\npe: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><span style=3D\"mso-char-type: =\nsymbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4</span></span>, and the roma=\nntic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility of the Indigo color palette=\n and the fabric qualities offered in this collection align beautifully with=\n the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&#8217;s commitment to except=\nional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitable for residential, hospitali=\nty, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<d=\niv class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsco=\ntt.com/blog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.=\njrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"htt=\np://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Rob=\nert Scott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxu=\nry\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?ta=\ng=3Dsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http=\n://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dtextiles\" rel=3D\"tag\">Textiles</a><br /=\n> Posted in <a This<=\n/a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"comment\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=\n=3D1212#respond\">Add a Comment</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"rss\" href=3D\"http://w=\nww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t=\n=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\" id=3D\"post-1179\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2><a href=3D\"http://www=\n.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link =\nto US Design Patent D650,608\">US Design Patent D650,608</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 =\nclass=3D\"byline\">January 18th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A\t\t\t\t=0A=0A\t\t\t\t=\n<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h2 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">United State=\ns Design Patent D650,608<br />=0AJ Robert Scott=C2=A0Cabriole Cabinet=C2=A0=\nDesigned by Sally Sirkin Lewis.</p>=0A<p><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott=\n.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\"><img class=3D\"alignc=\nenter size-full wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"cabriole-web\" src=3D\"http://www.jro=\nbertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" wi=\ndth=3D\"354\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></h2>=0A<h3 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">=\nSally Sirkin Lewis Adds New U.S. Design Patent</h3>=0A<p>Los Angeles, Calif=\nornia =E2=80=93 January 2012 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally know=\nn, American luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer announces that the U=\nnited States Patent Office has issued a Design Patent to designer Sally Sir=\nkin Lewis for her Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott, under t=\nhe leadership of President, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin=\n Lewis introduced the Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as part of the Ombr=C3=\n=A9 Collection, so named from the French word meaning shadow or shade.=C2=\n=A0 The dramatic 72=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown in excelsior ven=\neer, with Ombr=C3=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The proprietary finishing=\n technique exhibits subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to d=\nark, producing a distinctive, individual effect on each wood veneer.=C2=A0 =\nJ. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design milestone in decor=\native furniture finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection is s=\nigned and dated by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has been filed with=\n the United States Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto=\n.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four decades Ms. Lew=\nis, through her company has distinguished herself as a pioneer in the desig=\nn field and a leading source of originality in American furniture manufactu=\nring.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we make, in both qu=\nality and style, our products are proof that good design is timeless,=E2=80=\n=9D says Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are suddenly sensi=\ntive to the origin of the products in their homes, I think it is important =\nto note that J. Robert Scott furniture has always been Made in America,=E2=\n=80=9D she adds.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t=\n\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-sc=\nott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrober=\ntscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://ww=\nw.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin=\n Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dunited-state=\ns-design-patent\" rel=3D\"tag\">United States Design Patent</a><br /> Posted i=\nn <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?cat=3D41\" title=3D\"View all =\nposts in United States Patents\" rel=3D\"category\">United States Patents</a> =\n|   <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179#respond\" title=3D=\n\"Comment on US Design Patent D650,608\">No Comments &#187;</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a=\n class=3D\"share\" href=3D\"javascript:;\" title=3D\"US Design Patent D650,608\" =\nrel=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179\" onclick=3D\"xhtml.shareOp=\nen(this);\">Share This</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"comment\" href=3D\"http://www.jr=\nobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179#respond\">Add a Comment</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D=\n\"rss\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t\t\t\t</d=\niv>=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\" id=3D\"post-1177\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h=\n2><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1177\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" t=\nitle=3D\"Permanent Link to J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak St=\nreet Facility\">J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street Facili=\nty</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">January 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin --><=\n/h3>=0A\t\t\t\t=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" =\nclass=3D\"dn_post\">=0A<p>The internationally known luxury furniture and text=\niles manufacturer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/index.html\">J. Rob=\nert Scott, Inc.</a> announces the extension of the lease on its manufacturi=\nng facility in Inglewood, California, for more than six years.</p>=0A<p>The=\n company occupies more than 76,000 square feet of industrial space in the A=\nirport Business Park located at 500 North Oak Street where all facets of fu=\nrniture production take place. The facility serves as corporate headquarter=\ns for research and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=80=9CThe proximity of the d=\nesign team to production and manufacturing gives us the opportunity to foll=\now products day to day, from prototype through to finished piece, and to ob=\nserve the birth of new designs as they materialize in the hands of our tale=\nnted artisans,=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Officer Richard I. Chilcott. =\n=E2=80=9CAs a small organization, this instant access is very supportive of=\n open communication between all divisions.&#8221;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 =\nin Los Angeles by =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D designer <a href=3D\"http:/=\n/www.jrobertscott.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Sco=\ntt was born out of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=80=9CProvide her clients wi=\nth contemporary, well-made furnishings&#8221; that met her uncompromising s=\ntandards of quality and beauty. Her understated signature style has becomes=\n known as =E2=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; according to the company=E2=80=\n=99s web site.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the company currently employs 125=\n seasoned craftspeople in various disciplines, including designers, custome=\nr service, and office staff.=C2=A0Many of J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s employe=\nes have been with the company for decades.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t=\n</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"htt=\np://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dinterior-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior =\ndesgin</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-sco=\ntt-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. id=3D\"globalContent\">=0A=0A\t\t\t<!-- begin: about content -->=0A\t\t\t=\n<div id=3D\"aboutContent\">=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: about sidebar -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div=\n class=3D\"aboutSidebar\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"images/about-sidebar-photo.jpg\"=\n width=3D\"384\" height=3D\"487\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<br/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<img -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"aboutBody\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h1><img src=3D\"images/abou=\nt-body-heading-aboutcompany.png\" width=3D\"168\" height=3D\"19\" alt=3D\"About T=\nhe Company\"/></h1>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>J. Robert Scott, Inc. the luxury home furni=\nshings manufacturer was founded in 1972 in Los Angeles by Hall of Fame desi=\ngner Sally Sirkin Lewis.&nbsp; The company was born out of Ms. Lewis' desir=\ne to provide her clients with contemporary, well made furnishings that met =\nher uncompromising standards of quality and beauty.&nbsp; Her understated, =\nsignature style has become known as <i>\"California Design.\"</i>  To this da=\ny, she serves as the President of the company, which has established itself=\n as an influential design force around the world, with company owned showro=\noms in Los Angeles, New York, Chicago, Dallas, and London, and representati=\non in 21 cities in 14 countries.</p>=0A=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Ms. Lewis is recogn=\nized in the interior design industry for her achievements in furniture and =\ntextile design.&nbsp; Throughout her career she has remained true to her ae=\nsthetic philosophy of clean, elegant, contemporary design with uncompromisi=\nng attention to quality.&nbsp;=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"images/about-body-phot=\no.jpg\" width=3D\"170\" height=3D\"223\" alt=3D\"\" style=3D\"float: right; margin:=\n 20px 0 20px 20px\"/>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\tWith influences from the world of couture fa=\nshion, J. Robert Scott textiles are worthy of pr&ecirc;t-a-porter.&nbsp; Th=\nis translates well in the field of home furnishings where upholstery techni=\nques can echo the intricate lines of a one-of-a-kind garment.</p>=0A=0A=0A\t=\n\t\t\t\t<p>Throughout her career, Ms. Lewis has been awarded more than 150 U.S.=\n Design Patents for her furnishings which are manufactured by hand in the 7=\n6,000+ square foot factory in Inglewood, California.&nbsp; Through her guid=\nance and direction, J. Robert Scott has gained recognition as an exceptiona=\nl resource for custom design furniture.&nbsp; It is rare to find a company =\nthat can modify any of their existing items, or create an entirely new piec=\ne, tailored to the specific needs of their clientele.&nbsp;=0A\t\t\t\t\t<i>If it=\n can be drawn, it can be made.</i>  It is not unusual to see skilled crafts=\nmen, many of whom have been with Ms. Lewis for more than 20 years, hand sew=\ning the edges of a sofa or patiently applying gold leafing to a console wit=\nh a squirrel hair brush.&nbsp; The techniques used are the traditional cons=\ntruction methods that date back to the Renaissance, these talented craftsme=\nn are truly modern day artisans.</p>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>J. Robert Scott is well k=\nnown in the interior design industry for utilizing rare and exotic veneers,=\n as well as shagreen, snake and goatskin parchment in the manufacturing of =\nits products.&nbsp; The textile division offers a distinctive range of hand=\n-woven silks, silk mohair, wools, velvets and JRS Superkidskin&trade; among=\n nearly 700 couture-quality luxury fabrics, in the most appealing and conte=\nmporary colorways.</p>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>The company believes that an unwavering=\n dedication to quality and craftsmanship is what sets us apart. As Ms. Lewi=\ns says, the detailed fabrication and mirror-like finishes are \"unforgiving\"=\n...each piece <b>must</b> be flawless.&nbsp; While products are made in the=\n factory, J. Robert Scott <i>service</i> is exemplified in every showroom, =\neveryday.&nbsp; It's the people who sell    J. Robert Scott products who sh=\nare the high design aesthetic with interior designers worldwide day after d=\nay, year after year. Our salespeople establish long-standing relationships =\nwith interior designers around the world.&nbsp; These friendships are a sou=\nrce of pride and mutual loyalty.&nbsp;  In fact, with the company's custom =\ncapability and broad product range, there are pieces for every room and to =\nsuit every need, including residential, corporate, hospitality, yacht and a=\nircraft interiors.</p>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"sectionEnd\">Furniture and text=\niles designed by Sally Sirkin Lewis for J. Robert Scott meets and exceeds e=\nxpectation with sophisticated designs manufactured for lasting appeal and c=\nomfort.&nbsp; They are instantly recognized for their beauty and valued for=\n their quality, this is the essence of the company's commitment to producin=\ng \"Furniture as an Art Form.\"</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: about body -=\n->=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<br class=3D\"clear\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"furniture\"></div>=0A=0A\t=\n\t\t\t<!-- begin: about sidebar -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"aboutSidebar\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t=\n<img src=3D\"images/about-sidebar-furniture-001.jpg\" width=3D\"385\" height=3D=\n\"144\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: about sidebar -->=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!=\n-- begin: about body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"aboutBody\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h1><img sr=\nc=3D\"images/about-body-heading-aboutfurniture.png\" width=3D\"168\" height=3D\"=\n16\" alt=3D\"\"/></h1>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>We believe that how something is made is a=\ns important as why.&nbsp; From the conception of a simple drawing, J. Rober=\nt Scott can transform the idea into a finished piece, customized in every d=\netail.&nbsp; The ability to modify an existing item, or create an entirely =\nnew piece offers the interior design professional the opportunity to cater =\nto their client's most unusual desire. Custom furniture that is truly tailo=\nred to the individual is the essence of \"home couture.\"</p>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p cl=\nass=3D\"sectionEnd\">It is not uncommon for our engineering division to searc=\nh for a special clasp or hinge.&nbsp; In the same way a jeweler would creat=\ne a one-of-a-kind necklace or ring, furniture hand-built to your specificat=\nions by our talented craftsmen, become treasured heirlooms that carry with =\nthem a page of shared history.&nbsp; These traditional tenants of quality c=\nonstruction and superior material make J. Robert Scott furniture a reward a=\nnd a pleasure.&nbsp; The styles transcend temporary fashion with the certai=\nnty that good design has enduring appeal.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: =\nabout body -->=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<br class=3D\"clear\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"textiles\"></=\ndiv>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: about sidebar -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"aboutSideba=\nr\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"images/about-sidebar-textiles-001.jpg\" width=3D\"385\"=\n height=3D\"315\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: about sidebar -->=\n=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: about body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"aboutBody\">=0A\t\t\t\t=\n\t<h1><img src=3D\"images/about-body-heading-abouttextiles.png\" width=3D\"154\"=\n height=3D\"16\" alt=3D\"About JRS Textiles\"/></h1>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Of all of the=\n elements of interior design, fabric provides the greatest opportunity for =\nself expression, fulfilling an aesthetic need and reflecting a lifestyle.&n=\nbsp; J. Robert Scott textiles are synonymous with restrained elegance and e=\nxtraordinary quality.&nbsp; Each individual fabric with a character and tex=\nture of its own is presented in the largest and most desirable colorways.&n=\nbsp; For almost 30 years we have nurtured our relationships with our more t=\nhan 72 mills in 18 countries worldwide, to develop more than 900 signature =\ntextiles which are a hallmark of our brand.</p>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"secti=\nonEnd\">Contemporary interiors, with a sense of serene sophistication and st=\nylistic harmony rely on textiles in upholstery, window treatments and wall =\ncoverings to visually underline the decorative composition.&nbsp; Sensuous =\nlines and textures, in combination with contrasting surfaces, such as taupe=\n velvet and black lacquer, create a dialogue of light and shade, shiny and =\nmatte, with an almost abstract, sculptural effect.&nbsp; J. Robert Scott's =\nhand-woven silks, lustrous silk mohair, leathers, suiting wool and our excl=\nusive JRS Superkidskin&trade;, are suitable for use in residential, hospita=\nlity, yacht and aircraft interiors.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: about =\nbody -->=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<br class=3D\"clear\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"rental\"></div>=0A=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: about sidebar -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"aboutSidebar\">=0A\t=\n\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"images/about-sidebar-rental-001.jpg\" width=3D\"385\" height=\n=3D\"294\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"video\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3>J Robert Sc=\nott Salon Deco Lounge Chairs on the set of NBC's The Today Show.</h3>=0A\t\t\t=\n\t\t\t<p><a href=3D\"http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/21134540/vp/28811623#28811623\"=\n onclick=3D\"xhtml.embedVideo(); return false;\">Watch Video</a> &raquo;</p>=\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"videoContainer\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=3D\"http://www.msnbc.m=\nsn.com/id/21134540/vp/28811623#28811623\" onclick=3D\"xhtml.embedVideo(); ret=\nurn false;\"><img src=3D\"images/about-sidebar-video-001.jpg\" width=3D\"365\" h=\neight=3D\"234\" alt=3D\"\"/></a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: about sidebar -->=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: about body -->=0A\t\t=\n\t\t<div class=3D\"aboutBody\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h1><img src=3D\"images/about-body-headin=\ng-aboutrental.png\" width=3D\"340\" height=3D\"18\" alt=3D\"Ask About Our Exclusi=\nve Rental Program\"/></h1>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"sectionEnd\">Specially selec=\nted pieces are available for motion picture and television rental.&nbsp; We=\n can offer J. Robert Scott furniture for exclusive events, executive retrea=\nts, and real estate staging.<br/><br/>=0A\t\t\t\t\tE-mail your inquiry: <a href=\n=3D\"contact.html\">jtriolo-at-jrobertscott-dot-com</a></p>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><img=\n src=3D\"images/about-body-rental-002.jpg\" width=3D\"520\" height=3D\"347\" alt=\n=3D\"\"/></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"sectionEnd\"><img src=3D\"images/about-body-re=\nntal-001.jpg\" width=3D\"520\" height=3D\"405\" alt=3D\"\"/></p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t=\n\t\t<!-- end: about body -->=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<br class=3D\"clear\"/>=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t=\n<!-- end: about content -->=0A=0A\t\t</div>=0A\t\t<!-- end: CONTENT -->=0A=0A\t\t=\n<!-- begin: FOOTER -->=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"globalFooter\">=0A\t\t\t<p>&copy; Marco Polo described the indigo industry in the 13th=\n Century during his exploration of Western Asia and India. The powerful dye=\n, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable commodity to Europeans=\n, along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinnamon. </P>=0D=0A<P>T=\nhe Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis, is a refined sel=\nection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky \"mood\" of Indigo. The collect=\nion includes 4 qualities of 100% hand-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkid=\nskin<SPAN style=3D\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New R=\noman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso=\n-symbol-font-family: Symbol\"><SPAN style=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symb=\nol-font-family: Symbol\">=C3=A4</SPAN></SPAN>, and the romantic Edwardian Fl=\noral.</P>=0D=0A<P>The versatility of the Indigo color palette and the fabri=\nc qualities offered in this collection align beautifully with the J. Robert=\n Scott aesthetic and the company's commitment to exceptional quality. The I=\nndigo Collection is suitable for residential, hospitality, and yacht interi=\nors. </P></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"fabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t=\n\t<img src=3D\"image.html?imageId=3D1492&view=3Dtextile\" width=3D\"221\" height=\n=3D\"150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\n=3D\"fabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"image.html?imageId=3D1491&view=3Dtexti=\nle\" width=3D\"221\" height=3D\"150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=\n=0A\t\t\t=0A\t\t\t\t\t<br class=3D\"clear\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: textile it=\nem -->=0A=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t<!-- end: textile content -->=0A=0A\t\t</div>=0A\t\t=\n<!-- end: CONTENT -->=0A=0A\t\t<!-- begin: FOOTER -->=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"globalFo=\noter\">=0A\t\t\t<p>&copy; 2012 J. This luxury textile collection offers hand-woven silks, a thick=\n, textural woven wool &amp; silk blend, lustrous silk mohair and a delicate=\n ribbon basket weave. </P>=0D=0A<P>Deep Tones is a wide ranging textiles co=\nllection envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis that reflects her design ethos of=\n exceptional quality fabrics and uncompromising style. The collection is pr=\nesented in the form of chapters. Chapter II of Deep Tones communicates a vi=\nsual \"tone poem\" of subtle coloring and shades through a selection of 15 fa=\nbrics. Each textile reveals a distinct character and quality, all in a chos=\nen tone, Lichen.<BR><BR>To view the complete collection please visit one of=\n our showrooms. </P></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"fabricInf=\no\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"image.html?imageId=3D949&view=3Dtextile\" width=3D\"2=\n21\" height=3D\"150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p><H1 class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MAR=\nGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">&nbsp;Clockwise</H1>=0D=0A<P class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"M=\nARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4553 Silk Mohair - mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; =\nmso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA\">Gold. This precious =\nmineral has long been a symbol of value, capturing attention and sparking d=\nesire throughout history. <SPAN style=3D\"FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Tim=\nes New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-languag=\ne: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA\">Now with h=\ner modern day alchemy, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduces The Golden Collection =\nfrom the Golden State of California, an extraordinary group of sophisticate=\nd, luxurious textiles in tones of gold. </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P>=0D=0A<P><=\nSPAN style=3D\"FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-=\nfont-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-langu=\nage: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA\"><SPAN style=3D\"FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-=\nFAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-=\nansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA=\n\"><SPAN style=3D\"FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-farea=\nst-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-la=\nnguage: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA\"><SPAN style=3D\"FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FO=\nNT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; m=\nso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR=\n-SA\">Each distinct fabric in this large collection shares the sunlit qualit=\nies and golden hues that evoke a Californian dream. <SPAN style=3D\"FONT-SIZ=\nE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times Ne=\nw Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-l=\nanguage: AR-SA\">Realized in rich, natural hand-woven silk, silk mohair, woo=\nl-cashmere and silk blends, and a cut velvet of silk and cotton. </SPAN></S=\nPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"=\nfabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"image.html?imageId=3D937&view=3Dtextile\" w=\nidth=3D\"221\" height=3D\"150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p><H1 class=3DMsoNormal sty=\nle=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">Clockwise</H1>=0D=0A<P class=3DMsoNormal style=\n=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4498 Klimt - Golden<BR>54\" / 137cm<BR>100% Silk <=\n/P>=0D=0A<P class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4469 Laine She=\ner - Golden<BR>54\" / 137cm<BR>98% Wool, 2% Cashmere<BR><BR>#4524 Punjab - G=\nolden<BR>55\" / 139cm<BR>100% Silk</P>=0D=0A<P class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MA=\nRGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4446 Couture =E2=80=93 Golden<BR>54\" / 137cm<BR>100% Si=\nlk</P></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"fabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<i=\nmg src=3D\"image.html?imageId=3D942&view=3Dtextile\" width=3D\"221\" height=3D\"=\n150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p><H1 class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0=\npt\">Top to Bottom</H1>=0D=0A<P class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0=\npt\">#4508 Capri Stripe =E2=80=93 Golden, Ivory &amp; A cont=\ninuing Collection</H1>=0D=0A<P>The Deep Tones Collection, designed by Sally=\n Sirkin Lewis, presents a visual \"tone poem\" of subtle color, each chapter =\ndevoted to one tone. The first&nbsp;chapter, Elefant, brings together luxur=\ny textiles with distinct textures and character that&nbsp; share the color =\ninspiration from one of nature's most honored and treasured creatures, the =\nelephant.</P>=0D=0A<P>Elefant features several hand-woven silks, a patterne=\nd silk boucle, silk mohair, silk chenille, and an extraordinary metallic-fi=\nnish leather.&nbsp;Other selections chosen to debut in this first chapter o=\nf deep tones include an intricate basket weave, a mottled silk and wool mat=\nelasse, and a whisper-soft woven bamboo and silk sheer.&nbsp;</P></p>=0A\t\t\t=\n\t\t</div>=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"fabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"image.=\nhtml?imageId=3D933&view=3Dtextile\" width=3D\"221\" height=3D\"150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p><H1 class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">Top to Bott=\nom</H1>=0D=0A<P class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4459 Herri=\nngbone =E2=80=93 Elefant<BR>54\" / 137cm<BR>89% Wool, 11% Nylon</P>=0D=0A<P =\nclass=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4461 Mitos =E2=80=93 Elefa=\nnt<BR>55\" / 139cm<BR>65% Viscose, 20% Cotton, 15% Polyester</P>=0D=0A<P cla=\nss=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4460 Silk Tapis =E2=80=93 Ele=\nfant<BR>48\" / 122cm<BR>100% Silk</P>=0D=0A<P class=3DMsoNormal style=3D\"MAR=\nGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\">#4443 Lisette Boucle =E2=80=93 Ivory, Elefant, Ebony<BR>4=\n7.5\" / 120cm<BR>100% Silk</P></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"=\nfabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"image.html?imageId=3D966&view=3Dtextile\" w=\nidth=3D\"221\" height=3D\"150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p><H1>&nbsp;Clockwise</H1>=\n=0D=0A<P>#4461 Mitos - Robert Scott has created =\nthe Forever Neutral textile collection. This extraordinary selection&nbsp;o=\nf fabrics range from the softness of hand woven silks and the pebbled surfa=\nce of bouclette to the radiant ombre pattern of falling leaves on silk. <BR=\n><BR>Many of the textiles in this collection were inspired by historical do=\ncuments including the lyrical \"Swirl\" pattern and the graphic \"Le Jardin No=\nir\". The delicate patterns of the pure&nbsp;silk Borghese Series is Similar=\ny based on antique textiles. J Robert Scott has captured the beauty of thes=\ne textiles originating&nbsp;in history and high fashion couture and adapted=\n them in scale for today's interiors. <BR><BR>The Forever Neutral collectio=\nn is a versatile selection of fine sheers, ribbed striped and&nbsp;soft wov=\nen chenilles in the delicate natural shades that seamlessly coordinate to&n=\nbsp;create the most tranquil interior settings in residential, hospitality,=\n corporate, private jet, and yacht design. &nbsp;</P></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=\n=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"fabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<img src=3D\"image.html?imageI=\nd=3D972&view=3Dtextile\" width=3D\"221\" height=3D\"150\" alt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p>=\n</p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"fabricInfo\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<img src=\n=3D\"image.html?imageId=3D971&view=3Dtextile\" width=3D\"221\" height=3D\"150\" a=\nlt=3D\"\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t<p><H1>&nbsp;Corner&nbsp;Top&nbsp;Left to Corner Bottom R=\night&nbsp;&nbsp;</H1>=0D=0A<P>#3433 Silk Chenille - Cardamom<BR><BR>#4147 B=\nouclette - Limestone &amp; Ebony<BR><BR>#4142 Swirl - Dom &amp; Ivory<BR><B=\nR># 4143 Le Jardin - Ebony, Dom &amp; Ivory<BR><BR>#4144 Le Jardin Noir - E=\nbony, Dom,&nbsp;&amp; Ivory</P></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t=0A\t\t\t\t\t<br class=3D=\n\"clear\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: textile item -->=0A=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t=\n\t<!-- end: textile content -->=0A=0A\t\t</div>=0A\t\t<!-- end: CONTENT -->=0A=\n=0A\t\t<!-- begin: FOOTER -->=0A\t\t<div id=3D\"globalFooter\">=0A\t\t\t<p>&copy; 20=\n12 J. href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1212\" =\nrel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to J Robert Scott Indigo Textile C=\nollection Video\">J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Collection Video</a></h2>=0A=\n\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">March 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<d=\niv class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\" src=3D\"h=\nttp://www.youtube.com/embed/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfullscreen>=\n</iframe></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrob=\nertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\">=\n<img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo-fab-logo=\n-websize1\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/=\n03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"500\" /></=\na></p>=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo is a natur=\nal dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo described the i=\nndigo industry in the 13th Century during his exploration of Western Asia a=\nnd India. The powerful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valua=\nble commodity to Europeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger an=\nd cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin L=\newis, is a refined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky &#8220;=\nmood&#8221; of Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100% hand-wov=\nen silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: Symbol; m=\nso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times New =\nRoman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><span style=\n=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4</span></=\nspan>, and the romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility of the I=\nndigo color palette and the fabric qualities offered in this collection ali=\ngn beautifully with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&#8217;s c=\nommitment to exceptional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitable for res=\nidential, hospitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t=\n\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"ht=\ntp://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics</a>, <a =\nhref=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag\">Indigo<=\n/a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\"=\n rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.c=\nom/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrober=\ntscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</=\na>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dtextiles\" rel=3D\"tag=\n\">Textiles</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/=\n?cat=3D146\" title=3D\"View all posts in News, Events, Etc...\" rel=3D\"categor=\ny\">News, Events, Etc...</a> |   <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog=\n/?p=3D1212#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Colle=\nction Video\">No Comments &#187;</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"share\" href=3D\"j=\navascript:;\" title=3D\"J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Collection Video\" rel=\n=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1212\" onclick=3D\"xhtml.shareOpen(=\nthis);\">Share This</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"comment\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobe=\nrtscott.com/blog/?p=3D1212#respond\">Add a Comment</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"rs=\ns\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=\n=0A=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1177\"><a=\n href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1177\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=\n=3D\"Permanent Link to J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street=\n Facility\">J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street Facility</=\na></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">January 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=\n=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" class=3D\"dn=\n_post\">=0A<p>The internationally known luxury furniture and textiles manufa=\ncturer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/index.html\">J. Robert Scott, =\nInc.</a> announces the extension of the lease on its manufacturing facility=\n in Inglewood, California, for more than six years.</p>=0A<p>The company oc=\ncupies more than 76,000 square feet of industrial space in the Airport Busi=\nness Park located at 500 North Oak Street where all facets of furniture pro=\nduction take place. The facility serves as corporate headquarters for resea=\nrch and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=80=9CThe proximity of the design team =\nto production and manufacturing gives us the opportunity to follow products=\n day to day, from prototype through to finished piece, and to observe the b=\nirth of new designs as they materialize in the hands of our talented artisa=\nns,=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Officer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=80=9CAs =\na small organization, this instant access is very supportive of open commun=\nication between all divisions.&#8221;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in Los Angel=\nes by =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D designer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobert=\nscott.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott was born =\nout of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=80=9CProvide her clients with contempor=\nary, well-made furnishings&#8221; that met her uncompromising standards of =\nquality and beauty. Her understated signature style has becomes known as =\n=E2=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; according to the company=E2=80=99s web s=\nite.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the company currently employs 125 seasoned =\ncraftspeople in various disciplines, including designers, customer service,=\n and office staff.=C2=A0Many of J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s employees have be=\nen with the company for decades.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.j=\nrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dinterior-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior desgin</a=\n>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" r=\nel=3D\"tag\">J. Patent D650,608</a></h2>=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">January 18th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A=\n\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h2 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">United S=\ntates Design Patent D650,608<br />=0AJ Robert Scott=C2=A0Cabriole Cabinet=\n=C2=A0Designed by Sally Sirkin Lewis.</p>=0A<p><a href=3D\"http://www.jrober=\ntscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\"><img class=3D\"=\naligncenter size-full wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"cabriole-web\" src=3D\"http://w=\nww.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\" alt=\n=3D\"\" width=3D\"354\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></h2>=0A<h3 style=3D\"text-align: c=\nenter;\">Sally Sirkin Lewis Adds New U.S. Design Patent</h3>=0A<p>Los Angele=\ns, California =E2=80=93 January 2012 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationa=\nlly known, American luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer announces th=\nat the United States Patent Office has issued a Design Patent to designer S=\nally Sirkin Lewis for her Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott,=\n under the leadership of President, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sall=\ny Sirkin Lewis introduced the Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as part of the =\nOmbr=C3=A9 Collection, so named from the French word meaning shadow or shad=\ne.=C2=A0 The dramatic 72=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown in excelsio=\nr veneer, with Ombr=C3=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The proprietary fini=\nshing technique exhibits subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light=\n to dark, producing a distinctive, individual effect on each wood veneer.=\n=C2=A0 J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design milestone i=\nn decorative furniture finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 Collecti=\non is signed and dated by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has been fil=\ned with the United States Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://ww=\nw.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four decades =\nMs. Lewis, through her company has distinguished herself as a pioneer in th=\ne design field and a leading source of originality in American furniture ma=\nnufacturing.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we make, in =\nboth quality and style, our products are proof that good design is timeless=\n,=E2=80=9D says Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are suddenl=\ny sensitive to the origin of the products in their homes, I think it is imp=\nortant to note that J. Robert Scott furniture has always been Made in Ameri=\nca,=E2=80=9D she adds.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata=\n\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-rob=\nert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. href=3D\"http:/=\n/www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1047\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent L=\nink to SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.S. DESIGN PATENT FO=\nR ADELPHI LOUNGE\">SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.S. DESIG=\nN PATENT FOR ADELPHI LOUNGE</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">July 5th, 2=\n011 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Contact=\n: June Lockhart-Triolo<br />=0AMarketing Manager / Art Director<br />=0AMed=\nia &amp; Marketing Department<br />=0ATel: 310.680.4380<br />=0AFax: 310.68=\n0.4323<br />=0A<a href=3D\"jtriolo@jrobertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.co=\nm</a></p>=0A<p><strong>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</strong></p>=0A<p style=3D\"tex=\nt-align: center;\"><strong>SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.=\nS. DESIGN PATENT FOR ADELPHI LOUNGE</strong></p>=0A<p>Los Angeles, Californ=\nia - June 29, 2011 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known luxury f=\nurniture and textile manufacturer announces that the United States Patent O=\nffice has issued a design patent for the Adelphi Lounge Chair. (U.S. Design=\n Patent No. D638,229).</p>=0A<p>The company, under the leadership of Presid=\nent, Founder, and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduced the =\nlounge in 2010. The Adelphi Lounge features a strong angular profile and sw=\neeping curvature of the wood frame. The lounge is shown in J. Robert Scott&=\n#8217;s proprietary Ombr=C3=A9 finishing technique which produces a color t=\nransition of subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dark. Th=\ne innovative Ombr=C3=A9 finish concept results in one-of-a-kind examples of=\n Furniture as Art. In addition, a Utility Patent has been filed with the Un=\nited States Patent and Trademark Office, to safeguard the decorative finish=\n. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p styl=\ne=3D\"text-align: left;\">J. Robert Scott has established a rich brand herita=\nge of excellence and authenticity in the design world, and continues to inf=\nluence the community with the development of Ombr=C3=A9 which joins the gro=\nup of finish options offered by the company. Each item of furniture finishe=\nd in the Ombr=C3=A9 technique is signed and dated by designer Sally Sirkin =\nLewis, further enhancing the collectability of her work in the field. The U=\n.S. Design Patent on the Adelphi Lounge joins a long list of Ms. Lewis&#821=\n7; designs that have been granted patents over her nearly 40 year career.</=\np>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: left;\">For additional company and product info=\nrmation, please visit <a href=3D\"www.jrobertscott.com\">www.jrobertscott.com=\n</a></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\">Digital Images Available upon R=\nequest<br />=0APlease contact June Lockhart -Triolo <a href=3D\"jtriolo@jrob=\nertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: ce=\nnter;\"># # #</p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.j=\nrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/adelphi-lounge.jpg\"><img cl=\nass=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1055\" title=3D\"adelphi-lounge\" src=3D=\n\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/adelphi-lounge=\n.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"388\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t=\n\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrober=\ntscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dadelphi\" rel=3D\"tag\">Adelphi</a>, <a href=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott\" rel=3D\"tag\">J Robert Scott=\n</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dlounge\" rel=3D\"tag=\n\">Lounge</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" re=\nl=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsa=\nlly-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www=\n.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dunited-states-design-patent\" rel=3D\"tag\">Unit=\ned States Design Patent</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsc=\nott.com/blog/?cat=3D41\" title=3D\"View all posts in United States Patents\" r=\nel=3D\"category\">United States Patents</a> |   <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobert=\nscott.com/blog/?p=3D1047#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FO=\nR J. Video</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">March 9th, 2=\n012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><iframe=\n width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\" src=3D\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/MAPM-v8fA=\nnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-alig=\nn: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/=\n2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full w=\np-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo-fab-logo-websize1\" src=3D\"http://www.jroberts=\ncott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=\n=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=\n=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo is a natural dye that can be traced back to an=\ncient Egypt. Marco Polo described the indigo industry in the 13th Century d=\nuring his exploration of Western Asia and India. The powerful dye, from the=\n leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable commodity to Europeans, along wi=\nth coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Coll=\nection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis, is a refined selection of 10 l=\nuxury textiles in the deep inky &#8220;mood&#8221; of Indigo. The collectio=\nn includes 4 qualities of 100% hand-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidsk=\nin<span style=3D\"font-family: Symbol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New Rom=\nan'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-s=\nymbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><span style=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbo=\nl-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4</span></span>, and the romantic Edwardian Fl=\noral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility of the Indigo color palette and the fabric q=\nualities offered in this collection align beautifully with the J. Robert Sc=\nott aesthetic and the company&#8217;s commitment to exceptional quality. Th=\ne Indigo Collection is suitable for residential, hospitality, and yacht int=\neriors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postm=\netadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=\n=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com=\n/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jroberts=\ncott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: prototypes body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"p=\nrototypesBody\">=0A=0A\t\t=0A \t   \t  \t\t<h2 class=3D\"pagetitle\">Archive for Jan=\nuary, 2012</h2>=0A \t  =0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D=\n\"alignleft\"></div>=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"></div>=0A\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t=\n\t\t<div class=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1179\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jro=\nbertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to U=\nS Design Patent D650,608\">US Design Patent D650,608</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 clas=\ns=3D\"byline\">January 18th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=\n=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h2 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">United States Design P=\natent D650,608<br />=0AJ Robert Scott=C2=A0Cabriole Cabinet=C2=A0Designed b=\ny Sally Sirkin Lewis.</p>=0A<p><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/=\nwp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size=\n-full wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"cabriole-web\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.=\ncom/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"354=\n\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></h2>=0A<h3 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">Sally Sirk=\nin Lewis Adds New U.S. Design Patent</h3>=0A<p>Los Angeles, California =E2=\n=80=93 January 2012 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known, Americ=\nan luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer announces that the United Sta=\ntes Patent Office has issued a Design Patent to designer Sally Sirkin Lewis=\n for her Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott, under the leader=\nship of President, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis in=\ntroduced the Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as part of the Ombr=C3=A9 Collec=\ntion, so named from the French word meaning shadow or shade.=C2=A0 The dram=\natic 72=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown in excelsior veneer, with Om=\nbr=C3=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The proprietary finishing technique e=\nxhibits subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dark, produci=\nng a distinctive, individual effect on each wood veneer.=C2=A0 J. Robert Sc=\nott=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design milestone in decorative furnit=\nure finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection is signed and da=\nted by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has been filed with the United =\nStates Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov/\">http:=\n//www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four decades Ms. Lewis, through =\nher company has distinguished herself as a pioneer in the design field and =\na leading source of originality in American furniture manufacturing.=C2=A0 =\n=E2=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we make, in both quality and st=\nyle, our products are proof that good design is timeless,=E2=80=9D says Ms.=\n Lewis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are suddenly sensitive to the =\norigin of the products in their homes, I think it is important to note that=\n J. Robert Scott furniture has always been Made in America,=E2=80=9D she ad=\nds.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: =\n<a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=\n=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/b=\nlog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsco=\ntt.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, =\n<a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dunited-states-design-pat=\nent\" rel=3D\"tag\">United States Design Patent</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D=\n\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?cat=3D41\" title=3D\"View all posts in Uni=\nted States Patents\" rel=3D\"category\">United States Patents</a> |   <a href=\n=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on=\n US Design Patent D650,608\">No Comments &#187;</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"s=\nhare\" href=3D\"javascript:;\" title=3D\"US Design Patent D650,608\" rel=3D\"http=\n://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179\" onclick=3D\"xhtml.shareOpen(this);\">=\nShare This</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"comment\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.=\ncom/blog/?p=3D1179#respond\">Add a Comment</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"rss\" href=\n=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t=\n\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1177\"><a href=\n=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1177\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"P=\nermanent Link to J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street Faci=\nlity\">J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street Facility</a></h=\n2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">January 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" class=3D\"dn_po=\nst\">=0A<p>The internationally known luxury furniture and textiles manufactu=\nrer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/index.html\">J. Robert Scott, Inc=\n.</a> announces the extension of the lease on its manufacturing facility in=\n Inglewood, California, for more than six years.</p>=0A<p>The company occup=\nies more than 76,000 square feet of industrial space in the Airport Busines=\ns Park located at 500 North Oak Street where all facets of furniture produc=\ntion take place. The facility serves as corporate headquarters for research=\n and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=80=9CThe proximity of the design team to =\nproduction and manufacturing gives us the opportunity to follow products da=\ny to day, from prototype through to finished piece, and to observe the birt=\nh of new designs as they materialize in the hands of our talented artisans,=\n=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Officer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=80=9CAs a s=\nmall organization, this instant access is very supportive of open communica=\ntion between all divisions.&#8221;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in Los Angeles =\nby =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D designer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsco=\ntt.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott was born out=\n of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=80=9CProvide her clients with contemporary=\n, well-made furnishings&#8221; that met her uncompromising standards of qua=\nlity and beauty. Her understated signature style has becomes known as =E2=\n=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; according to the company=E2=80=99s web site=\n.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the company currently employs 125 seasoned cra=\nftspeople in various disciplines, including designers, customer service, an=\nd office staff.=C2=A0Many of J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s employees have been =\nwith the company for decades.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t=\n\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobe=\nrtscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dinterior-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior desgin</a>, <=\na href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=\n=3D\"tag\">J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.S. DESIGN PATENT FO=\nR ADELPHI LOUNGE\">SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.S. DESIG=\nN PATENT FOR ADELPHI LOUNGE</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">July 5th, 2=\n011 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Contact=\n: June Lockhart-Triolo<br />=0AMarketing Manager / Art Director<br />=0AMed=\nia &amp; Marketing Department<br />=0ATel: 310.680.4380<br />=0AFax: 310.68=\n0.4323<br />=0A<a href=3D\"jtriolo@jrobertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.co=\nm</a></p>=0A<p><strong>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</strong></p>=0A<p style=3D\"tex=\nt-align: center;\"><strong>SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.=\nS. DESIGN PATENT FOR ADELPHI LOUNGE</strong></p>=0A<p>Los Angeles, Californ=\nia - June 29, 2011 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known luxury f=\nurniture and textile manufacturer announces that the United States Patent O=\nffice has issued a design patent for the Adelphi Lounge Chair. (U.S. Design=\n Patent No. D638,229).</p>=0A<p>The company, under the leadership of Presid=\nent, Founder, and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduced the =\nlounge in 2010. The Adelphi Lounge features a strong angular profile and sw=\neeping curvature of the wood frame. The lounge is shown in J. Robert Scott&=\n#8217;s proprietary Ombr=C3=A9 finishing technique which produces a color t=\nransition of subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dark. Th=\ne innovative Ombr=C3=A9 finish concept results in one-of-a-kind examples of=\n Furniture as Art. In addition, a Utility Patent has been filed with the Un=\nited States Patent and Trademark Office, to safeguard the decorative finish=\n. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p styl=\ne=3D\"text-align: left;\">J. Robert Scott has established a rich brand herita=\nge of excellence and authenticity in the design world, and continues to inf=\nluence the community with the development of Ombr=C3=A9 which joins the gro=\nup of finish options offered by the company. Each item of furniture finishe=\nd in the Ombr=C3=A9 technique is signed and dated by designer Sally Sirkin =\nLewis, further enhancing the collectability of her work in the field. The U=\n.S. Design Patent on the Adelphi Lounge joins a long list of Ms. Lewis&#821=\n7; designs that have been granted patents over her nearly 40 year career.</=\np>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: left;\">For additional company and product info=\nrmation, please visit <a href=3D\"www.jrobertscott.com\">www.jrobertscott.com=\n</a></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\">Digital Images Available upon R=\nequest<br />=0APlease contact June Lockhart -Triolo <a href=3D\"jtriolo@jrob=\nertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: ce=\nnter;\"># # #</p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.j=\nrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/adelphi-lounge.jpg\"><img cl=\nass=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1055\" title=3D\"adelphi-lounge\" src=3D=\n\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/adelphi-lounge=\n.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"388\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t=\n\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrober=\ntscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dadelphi\" rel=3D\"tag\">Adelphi</a>, <a href=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott\" rel=3D\"tag\">J Robert Scott=\n</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dlounge\" rel=3D\"tag=\n\">Lounge</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" re=\nl=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsa=\nlly-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www=\n.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dunited-states-design-patent\" rel=3D\"tag\">Unit=\ned States Design Patent</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsc=\nott.com/blog/?cat=3D41\" title=3D\"View all posts in United States Patents\" r=\nel=3D\"category\">United States Patents</a> |   <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobert=\nscott.com/blog/?p=3D1047#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FO=\nR J. -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: prototypes body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"prototy=\npesBody\">=0A=0A\t\t=0A \t   \t  \t\t<h2 class=3D\"pagetitle\">Archive for May, 2011=\n</h2>=0A \t  =0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignleft=\n\"></div>=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"></div>=0A\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div cla=\nss=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-976\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.c=\nom/blog/?p=3D976\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to SALLY SIRKIN =\nLEWIS RECOGNIZED AMONG 50 TITANS OF DESIGN\">SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS RECOGNIZED A=\nMONG 50 TITANS OF DESIGN</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">May 9th, 2011 =\n<!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"Ms=\noNormal\" style=3D\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-align: left; tab-stops: 170.0pt=\n;\"><span style=3D\"font-size: small; font-family: Garamond;\"><span style=3D\"=\nfont-size: small; font-family: Garamond;\">Contact: June Lockhart-Triolo<br =\n/>=0AMarketing Manager / Art Director<br />=0AMedia &amp; Marketing Departm=\nent<br />=0ATel: 310.680.4380<br />=0AFax: 310.680.4323<br />=0A<a href=3D\"=\njtriolo@jrobertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></span></span></p>=0A=\n<p>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: left;\">=C2=A0=C2=A0=\n=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=\n=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=\n=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS RECOGNI=\nZED AMONG 50 TITANS OF DESIGN</p>=0A<p>Los Angeles, California - Sally Sirk=\nin Lewis, president and founder of J. Robert Scott is recognized as one of =\nthe 50 Titans of Design by the Los Angeles Times. The May 1st edition of th=\ne Los Angeles Times Magazine selected &#8220;classic works by the trailblaz=\ners, past and present, who shaped the form and spirit of Southern Californi=\na&#8221;. Ms. Lewis is in the company of design giants from architecture su=\nch as Schindler, Lautner, Neutra, Gehry, and legendary furniture designers =\nlike Charles &amp; Ray Eames, Maloof, and Frankl.</p>=0A<p>To exemplify Ms.=\n Lewis&#8217; design style, The Los Angeles Times selected a Louis XVI Faut=\neuil which, as interpreted by the designer in 1978, was upholstered in zebr=\na skin. As the first woman to open a showroom on Melrose Avenue in the desi=\ngn district in 1972, Ms. Lewis has continually evolved her design ethos, an=\nd challenged the standards of furniture manufacturing. Most recently Ms. Le=\nwis developed a revolutionary finishing process which she named Ombr=C3=A9,=\n a proprietary technique that captures the gradient effect of color in text=\niles, and translates the concept to wood veneers. Sally Sirkin Lewis, like =\nthe visionary counterparts listed in the L.A. Times feature, continues to i=\nnspire the design community, and many others who simply appreciate beauty.<=\n/p>=0A<p>For additional company and product information, please visit <a hr=\nef=3D\"www.jrobertscott.com\">www.jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p>Digital Image=\ns Available upon Request<br />=0APlease contact June Lockhart -Triolo <a hr=\nef=3D\"jtriolo@jrobertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p class=\n=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-align: center; tab-stops:=\n 170.0pt;\"><a title=3D\"the-los-angeles-times-magazine-may-201=\n11\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/the-=\nlos-angeles-times-magazine-may-20111.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"500\" height=3D\"=\n666\" /></a></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jr=\nobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/p1-la-times-may1-20111.jpg\">=\n<img /></a></p>=0A\t\t\t=\n\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"ht=\ntp://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Ddesign\" rel=3D\"tag\">Design</a>, <a Dlg','sans-serif';\"> </span><span style=3D\"font=\n-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Minion','serif';\">a ground-breaking achievement =\nin decorative furniture finishing designed and developed by Sally Sirkin Le=\nwis.=C2=A0 The innovative concept has never been attempted on wood veneer, =\nand marks a milestone in the design field.=C2=A0 Ombr</span><span style=3D\"=\nfont-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Minion','serif';\">=C3=A9</span><span style=\n=3D\"font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Minion','serif';\"> Veneer finishes accen=\ntuate the inherent characteristics of the wood and exhibit subtle gradients=\n in intensity and shade from dark to light, producing a distinctive, indivi=\ndual effect on each veneer, as individual as a fingerprint.</span></p>=0A<p=\n><object Robert S=\ncott announces the introduction of Ombr=C3=A9 a ground-breaking achievement=\n in decorative furniture finishing designed and developed by Sally Sirkin L=\newis.</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">September 24th, 2010 <!-- by admi=\nn --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" sty=\nle=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\"><a href=3D\"mailto:jtriolo@jr=\nobertscott.com\"></a>Contact: June Lockhart-Triolo<br />=0AMarketing Manager=\n / Art Director<br />=0AMedia &amp; Marketing Department<br />=0ATel: 310.6=\n80.4380<br />=0AFax: 310.680.4323<br />=0A<a href=3D\"mailto:jtriolo@jrobert=\nscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=\n=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</p>=0A<p=\n class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">J. R=\nOBERT SCOTT INTRODUCES OMBR=C3=89</p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MAR=\nGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">Los Angeles, California =E2=80=93 Sep=\ntember, 2010 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known luxury furnitu=\nre and textile manufacturer announces the introduction of Ombr=C3=A9, a gro=\nund-breaking achievement in decorative furniture finishing.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p =\nclass=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">After=\n three years of development, the company, under the leadership of President=\n, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis <a href=3D\"http://w=\nww.architecturaldigest.com/architects/100/sally_lewis/sally_lewis_profile\">=\nhttp://www.architecturaldigest.com/architects/100/sally_lewis/sally_lewis_p=\nrofile</a><br />=0Aunveils the proprietary finishing technique on selected =\nnew designs.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CI was intrigued by the transparent effect of wa=\ntercolors, and I wanted to translate the concept of a seamless color transi=\ntion to wood veneer,=E2=80=9D explains Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 The resulting finis=\nhes exhibit subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dark, pro=\nducing a distinctive, individual effect on each veneer.</p>=0A<p class=3D\"M=\nsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">In French, the =\nword ombr=C3=A9 means shadow or shade.=C2=A0 The term, ombr=C3=A9 is common=\nly used in the field of textiles to refer to a color effect that is general=\nly produced by arranging different tones of threads or fibers in the warp o=\nf a woven fabric.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0=\nin 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative concept ha=\ns never been attempted as a decorative furniture finish, and marks a milest=\none in the design field.=C2=A0 The proprietary technique offered in Daybrea=\nk Ombr=C3=A9=E2=84=A2, Twilight Ombr=C3=A9=E2=84=A2, Mist Ombr=C3=A9=E2=84=\n=A2 and Storm Ombr=C3=A9=E2=84=A2 finishes, result in one-of-a-kind example=\ns of Furniture as Art.=C2=A0 A=C2=A0 Utility Patent has been filed with the=\n United States Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov=\n/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: =\n0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">For additional company and product informa=\ntion, please visit <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com\">www.jrobertscott=\n.com</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-sto=\nps: 170.0pt\">Digital Images Available upon Request<br />=0APlease contact J=\nune Lockhart =E2=80=93Triolo <a href=3D\"mailto:jtriolo@jrobertscott.com\">jt=\nriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"text-align=\n: center;\">=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"tex=\nt-align: center;\">=C2=A0</p>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: =\nnormal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<d=\niv><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-fon=\nt-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font=\n-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></=\ndiv>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso=\n-bidi-font-style: normal\"><span style=3D\"font-size: 10pt; font-family: Gara=\nmond;\"></span></em></strong></div>=0A<p><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weig=\nht: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"><span style=3D\"font-s=\nize: 10pt; font-family: Garamond;\"><span style=3D\"font-size: 10pt; font-fam=\nily: Garamond;\"></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\">=0A<div><strong sty=\nle=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: norma=\nl\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: norma=\nl\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><s=\ntrong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-sty=\nle: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weig=\nht: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=\n=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bid=\ni-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi=\n-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></stro=\nng></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=\n=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=\n=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"=\n></em></strong></div>=0A<p><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><=\nem style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"><span style=3D\"font-size: 10pt; &#8220;Green Initiative&#8221;</=\na></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">April 22nd, 2009 <!-- by admin --></h3>=\n=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Contact: June Lockhart-Triolo<br =\n/>=0AMedia &amp; Marketing Manager/Art Director<br />=0ATel: 310.680.4380 F=\nax: 310.680.4323<br />=0Ajtriolo@jrobertscott.com</p>=0A<p>FOR IMMEDIATE RE=\nLEASE</p>=0A<p>J. ROBERT SCOTT, INC. ANNOUNCES =E2=80=9CGREEN INITIATIVE=E2=\n=80=9D</p>=0A<p>Los Angeles, California, (April 22, 2009) - J. Robert Scott=\n, Inc., the luxury textiles and furnishings manufacturer announces that it =\nhas implemented a major energy conservation and recycling program in its 10=\n0,000 square foot factory and executive offices in Inglewood, California.</=\np>=0A<p>The first stage, which is scheduled for completion Friday, April 24=\nth, involves replacing all existing 400 magnetic ballast, and 850 lamps in =\nthe facility with energy efficient lamps in new electric ballasts. This wil=\nl result in an energy savings of more than 62% over the current consumption=\n and will result in a 60% savings in DWP charges. According to facilities m=\nanager Marvin Melendez, =E2=80=9CWe expect to see an immediate return on ou=\nr investment in the de-lamping project, and we found the brightness and cla=\nrity of the light in the warehouse and production area is greatly improved.=\n=E2=80=9D</p>=0A<p>The second part of the company=E2=80=99s green initiativ=\ne expands the recycling program. Office paper, beverage containers, and car=\ndboard have been a part of the established recycling program, now the compa=\nny has a method to recycle the scrap material, such as Dacron, cushion foam=\n, wood, and packaging that result from furniture manufacturing. The company=\n purchases office products with recycled content, and encourages re-use whe=\nnever possible. =E2=80=9CI am happy to do our share and participate in this=\n project,=E2=80=9D said Sally Sirkin Lewis, president and founder of J. Rob=\nert Scott. =E2=80=9CThese are worthwhile contributions to the effort to mak=\ne Los Angeles, a cleaner, greener place to live and work.=E2=80=9D</p>=0A<p=\n style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/=\nwp-content/uploads/2009/04/lighting-project1.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter=\n size-medium wp-image-492\" title=3D\"lighting-project1\" src=3D\"http://www.jr=\nobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/lighting-project1.jpg\" alt=\n=3D\"\" /></a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t=\n<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dearth-day\" rel=\n=3D\"tag\">Earth Day</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3D=\nefficient\" rel=3D\"tag\">Efficient</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.co=\nm/blog/?tag=3Denergy\" rel=3D\"tag\">Energy</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobert=\nscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dgreen-initiative\" rel=3D\"tag\">Green Initiative</a>, <=\na href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott\" rel=3D\"ta=\ng\">J Robert Scott</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dl=\nights\" rel=3D\"tag\">Lights</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/=\n?tag=3Drecycling\" rel=3D\"tag\">Recycling</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http=\n://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?cat=3D146\" title=3D\"View all posts in News, E=\nvents, Etc...\" rel=3D\"category\">News, Events, Marco Polo described the indigo industr=\ny in the 13th Century during his exploration of Western Asia and India. The=\n powerful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable commodity=\n to Europeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinnamon.</=\np>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis, is a re=\nfined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky &#8220;mood&#8221; o=\nf Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100% hand-woven silk, silk=\n mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: Symbol; mso-ascii-font=\n-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-c=\nhar-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><span style=3D\"mso-char-=\ntype: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4</span></span>, and th=\ne romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility of the Indigo color p=\nalette and the fabric qualities offered in this collection align beautifull=\ny with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&#8217;s commitment to =\nexceptional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitable for residential, hos=\npitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A]]></content:enc=\noded>=0A\t\t\t<wfw:commentRss>http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2&am=\np;p=3D1212</wfw:commentRss>=0A\t\t</item>=0A\t\t<item>=0A\t\t<title>US Design Pat=\nent D650,608</title>=0A\t\t<link>http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179</=\nlink>=0A\t\t<comments>http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179#comments</co=\nmments>=0A\t\t<pubDate>Wed, 18 Jan 2012 19:44:10 +0000</pubDate>=0A\t\t<dc:crea=\ntor>admin</dc:creator>=0A\t\t=0A\t\t<category><![CDATA[United States Patents]]>=\n</category>=0A=0A\t\t<category><![CDATA[J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known, American luxury=\n furniture and textiles manufacturer announces that the United States Paten=\nt Office has issued a Design Patent to designer Sally Sirkin Lewis for her =\nCabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott, under the leadership of P=\nresident, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduced =\nthe Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as part of the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection, so =\nnamed from the French word meaning shadow or shade.=C2=A0 The dramatic 72=\n=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown in excelsior veneer, with Ombr=C3=\n=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The proprietary finishing technique exhibi=\nts subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dark, producing a =\ndistinctive, individual effect on each wood veneer.=C2=A0 J. Robert Scott=\n=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design milestone in decorative furniture=\n finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection is signed and dated=\n by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has been filed with the United Sta=\ntes Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov/\">http://w=\nww.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four decades Ms. Lewis, through her=\n company has distinguished herself as a pioneer in the design field and a l=\neading source of originality in American furniture manufacturing.=C2=A0 =E2=\n=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we make, in both quality and style=\n, our products are proof that good design is timeless,=E2=80=9D says Ms. Le=\nwis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are suddenly sensitive to the ori=\ngin of the products in their homes, I think it is important to note that J.=\n Robert Scott furniture has always been Made in America,=E2=80=9D she adds.=\n</p>=0A]]></content:encoded>=0A\t\t\t<wfw:commentRss>http://www.jrobertscott.c=\nom/blog/?feed=3Drss2&amp;p=3D1179</wfw:commentRss>=0A\t\t</item>=0A\t\t<item>=\n=0A\t\t<title>J. Robert Scott, Inc.</a> announces the extension of =\nthe lease on its manufacturing facility in Inglewood, California, for more =\nthan six years.</p>=0A<p>The company occupies more than 76,000 square feet =\nof industrial space in the Airport Business Park located at 500 North Oak S=\ntreet where all facets of furniture production take place. The facility ser=\nves as corporate headquarters for research and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=\n=80=9CThe proximity of the design team to production and manufacturing give=\ns us the opportunity to follow products day to day, from prototype through =\nto finished piece, and to observe the birth of new designs as they material=\nize in the hands of our talented artisans,=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Of=\nficer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=80=9CAs a small organization, this instant a=\nccess is very supportive of open communication between all divisions.&#8221=\n;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in Los Angeles by =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D=\n designer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirk=\nin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott was born out of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=\n=80=9CProvide her clients with contemporary, well-made furnishings&#8221; t=\nhat met her uncompromising standards of quality and beauty. Her understated=\n signature style has becomes known as =E2=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; ac=\ncording to the company=E2=80=99s web site.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the c=\nompany currently employs 125 seasoned craftspeople in various disciplines, =\nincluding designers, customer service, and office staff.=C2=A0Many of J.
