Video</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">Ma=\nrch 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t=\n<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\" src=3D\"http://www.youtube.com/embed=\n/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>=0A<p style=3D=\n\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-conten=\nt/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter s=\nize-full wp-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo-fab-logo-websize1\" src=3D\"http://ww=\nw.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1=\n.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=0A<div class=3D\"desc=\nription\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo is a natural dye that can be traced b=\nack to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo described the indigo industry in the 13th =\nCentury during his exploration of Western Asia and India. The powerful dye,=\n from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable commodity to Europeans,=\n along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The In=\ndigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis, is a refined selectio=\nn of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky &#8220;mood&#8221; of Indigo. The =\ncollection includes 4 qualities of 100% hand-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS S=\nuperkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: Symbol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Time=\ns New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-char-type: symb=\nol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><span style=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; =\nmso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4</span></span>, and the romantic Edw=\nardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility of the Indigo color palette and the=\n fabric qualities offered in this collection align beautifully with the J. =\nRobert Scott aesthetic and the company&#8217;s commitment to exceptional qu=\nality. The Indigo Collection is suitable for residential, hospitality, and =\nyacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=\n=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/b=\nlog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jroberts=\ncott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.=\njrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scot=\nt Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=\n=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsal=\nly-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.=\njrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dtextiles\" rel=3D\"tag\">Textiles</a><br /> Poste=\nd in <a This</a>=0A\t\t=\n\t\t\t<a class=3D\"comment\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1212#=\nrespond\">Add a Comment</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"rss\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobe=\nrtscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<d=\niv class=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1179\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobert=\nscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to US De=\nsign Patent D650,608\">US Design Patent D650,608</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D=\n\"byline\">January 18th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"e=\nntry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h2 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">United States Design Patent=\n D650,608<br />=0AJ Robert Scott=C2=A0Cabriole Cabinet=C2=A0Designed by Sal=\nly Sirkin Lewis.</p>=0A<p><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-co=\nntent/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full=\n wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"cabriole-web\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/b=\nlog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"354\" hei=\nght=3D\"500\" /></a></h2>=0A<h3 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">Sally Sirkin Le=\nwis Adds New U.S. Design Patent</h3>=0A<p>Los Angeles, California =E2=80=93=\n January 2012 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known, American lux=\nury furniture and textiles manufacturer announces that the United States Pa=\ntent Office has issued a Design Patent to designer Sally Sirkin Lewis for h=\ner Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott, under the leadership o=\nf President, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduc=\ned the Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as part of the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection, =\nso named from the French word meaning shadow or shade.=C2=A0 The dramatic 7=\n2=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown in excelsior veneer, with Ombr=C3=\n=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The proprietary finishing technique exhibi=\nts subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dark, producing a =\ndistinctive, individual effect on each wood veneer.=C2=A0 J. Robert Scott=\n=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design milestone in decorative furniture=\n finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection is signed and dated=\n by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has been filed with the United Sta=\ntes Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov/\">http://w=\nww.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four decades Ms. Lewis, through her=\n company has distinguished herself as a pioneer in the design field and a l=\neading source of originality in American furniture manufacturing.=C2=A0 =E2=\n=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we make, in both quality and style=\n, our products are proof that good design is timeless,=E2=80=9D says Ms. Le=\nwis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are suddenly sensitive to the ori=\ngin of the products in their homes, I think it is important to note that J.=\n Robert Scott furniture has always been Made in America,=E2=80=9D she adds.=\n</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a =\nhref=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"=\ntag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/=\n?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.c=\nom/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a h=\nref=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dunited-states-design-patent\"=\n rel=3D\"tag\">United States Design Patent</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"htt=\np://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?cat=3D41\" title=3D\"View all posts in United =\nStates Patents\" rel=3D\"category\">United States Patents</a> |   <a href=3D\"h=\nttp://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on US D=\nesign Patent D650,608\">No Comments &#187;</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"share\"=\n href=3D\"javascript:;\" title=3D\"US Design Patent D650,608\" rel=3D\"http://ww=\nw.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179\" onclick=3D\"xhtml.shareOpen(this);\">Share=\n This</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"comment\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/b=\nlog/?p=3D1179#respond\">Add a Comment</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"rss\" href=3D\"ht=\ntp://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t</di=\nv>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1177\"><a href=3D\"http=\n://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1177\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent=\n Link to J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street Facility\">J.=\n Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street Facility</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t=\n\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">January 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<di=\nv class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" class=3D\"dn_post\">=0A<p>=\nThe internationally known luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer <a hre=\nf=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/index.html\">J. Robert Scott, Inc.</a> anno=\nunces the extension of the lease on its manufacturing facility in Inglewood=\n, California, for more than six years.</p>=0A<p>The company occupies more t=\nhan 76,000 square feet of industrial space in the Airport Business Park loc=\nated at 500 North Oak Street where all facets of furniture production take =\nplace. The facility serves as corporate headquarters for research and desig=\nn as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=80=9CThe proximity of the design team to production=\n and manufacturing gives us the opportunity to follow products day to day, =\nfrom prototype through to finished piece, and to observe the birth of new d=\nesigns as they materialize in the hands of our talented artisans,=E2=80=9D =\nsays Chief Operating Officer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=80=9CAs a small organ=\nization, this instant access is very supportive of open communication betwe=\nen all divisions.&#8221;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in Los Angeles by =E2=80=\n=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D designer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/ab=\nout.html#jrs\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott was born out of Lewis=\n=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=80=9CProvide her clients with contemporary, well-ma=\nde furnishings&#8221; that met her uncompromising standards of quality and =\nbeauty. Her understated signature style has becomes known as =E2=80=9CCalif=\nornia Design,&#8221; according to the company=E2=80=99s web site.</p>=0A<p>=\nIn this location, the company currently employs 125 seasoned craftspeople i=\nn various disciplines, including designers, customer service, and office st=\naff.=C2=A0Many of J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s employees have been with the co=\nmpany for decades.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div cla=\nss=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com=\n/blog/?tag=3Dinterior-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior desgin</a>, <a href=3D\"h=\nttp://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Video</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 c=\nlass=3D\"byline\">March 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=\n=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\" src=3D\"http://ww=\nw.youtube.com/embed/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe=\n></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott=\n.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\"><img cla=\nss=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo-fab-logo-websize=\n1\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indig=\no-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=\n=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo is a natural dye=\n that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo described the indigo =\nindustry in the 13th Century during his exploration of Western Asia and Ind=\nia. The powerful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a valuable co=\nmmodity to Europeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, ginger and cinn=\namon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sirkin Lewis, =\nis a refined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky &#8220;mood&#=\n8221; of Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100% hand-woven sil=\nk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: Symbol; mso-asc=\nii-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'=\n; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><span style=3D\"ms=\no-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4</span></span>,=\n and the romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility of the Indigo =\ncolor palette and the fabric qualities offered in this collection align bea=\nutifully with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&#8217;s commitm=\nent to exceptional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitable for residenti=\nal, hospitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=\n=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://ww=\nw.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics</a>, <a href=3D=\n\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag\">Indigo</a>, <a=\n href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D=\n\"tag\">J. class=3D\"byline\">January 18th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h2 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">Unite=\nd States Design Patent D650,608<br />=0AJ Robert Scott=C2=A0Cabriole Cabine=\nt=C2=A0Designed by Sally Sirkin Lewis.</p>=0A<p><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobe=\nrtscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\"><img class=3D=\n\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"cabriole-web\" src=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\" alt=\n=3D\"\" width=3D\"354\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></h2>=0A<h3 style=3D\"text-align: c=\nenter;\">Sally Sirkin Lewis Adds New U.S. Design Patent</h3>=0A<p>Los Angele=\ns, California =E2=80=93 January 2012 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationa=\nlly known, American luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer announces th=\nat the United States Patent Office has issued a Design Patent to designer S=\nally Sirkin Lewis for her Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott,=\n under the leadership of President, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sall=\ny Sirkin Lewis introduced the Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as part of the =\nOmbr=C3=A9 Collection, so named from the French word meaning shadow or shad=\ne.=C2=A0 The dramatic 72=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown in excelsio=\nr veneer, with Ombr=C3=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The proprietary fini=\nshing technique exhibits subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light=\n to dark, producing a distinctive, individual effect on each wood veneer.=\n=C2=A0 J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design milestone i=\nn decorative furniture finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 Collecti=\non is signed and dated by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has been fil=\ned with the United States Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://ww=\nw.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four decades =\nMs. Lewis, through her company has distinguished herself as a pioneer in th=\ne design field and a leading source of originality in American furniture ma=\nnufacturing.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we make, in =\nboth quality and style, our products are proof that good design is timeless=\n,=E2=80=9D says Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are suddenl=\ny sensitive to the origin of the products in their homes, I think it is imp=\nortant to note that J. Robert Scott furniture has always been Made in Ameri=\nca,=E2=80=9D she adds.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata=\n\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-rob=\nert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California O=\nak Street Facility\">J. Robert Scott Renews Lease of California Oak Street F=\nacility</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">January 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin=\n --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" cl=\nass=3D\"dn_post\">=0A<p>The internationally known luxury furniture and textil=\nes manufacturer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/index.html\">J. Rober=\nt Scott, Inc.</a> announces the extension of the lease on its manufacturing=\n facility in Inglewood, California, for more than six years.</p>=0A<p>The c=\nompany occupies more than 76,000 square feet of industrial space in the Air=\nport Business Park located at 500 North Oak Street where all facets of furn=\niture production take place. The facility serves as corporate headquarters =\nfor research and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=80=9CThe proximity of the des=\nign team to production and manufacturing gives us the opportunity to follow=\n products day to day, from prototype through to finished piece, and to obse=\nrve the birth of new designs as they materialize in the hands of our talent=\ned artisans,=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Officer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=\n=80=9CAs a small organization, this instant access is very supportive of op=\nen communication between all divisions.&#8221;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in =\nLos Angeles by =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D designer <a href=3D\"http://ww=\nw.jrobertscott.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott =\nwas born out of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=80=9CProvide her clients with =\ncontemporary, well-made furnishings&#8221; that met her uncompromising stan=\ndards of quality and beauty. Her understated signature style has becomes kn=\nown as =E2=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; according to the company=E2=80=99=\ns web site.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the company currently employs 125 se=\nasoned craftspeople in various disciplines, including designers, customer s=\nervice, and office staff.=C2=A0Many of J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s employees =\nhave been with the company for decades.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</d=\niv>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http:/=\n/www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dinterior-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior des=\ngin</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-=\ninc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. S=\nirkin Lewis.=C2=A0 The innovative concept has never been attempted on wood =\nveneer, and marks a milestone in the design field.=C2=A0 Ombr</span><span s=\ntyle=3D\"font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Minion','serif';\">=C3=A9</span><span=\n style=3D\"font-size: 16pt; font-family: 'Minion','serif';\"> Veneer finishes=\n accentuate the inherent characteristics of the wood and exhibit subtle gra=\ndients in intensity and shade from dark to light, producing a distinctive, =\nindividual effect on each veneer, as individual as a fingerprint.</span></p>=\n=0A<p><object ROBE=\nRT SCOTT INTRODUCES OMBR=C3=89 (The Video)\">No Comments &#187;</a></p>=0A\t\t=\n\t\t\t<a class=3D\"share\" href=3D\"javascript:;\" title=3D\"J. Robert Scott announc=\nes the introduction of Ombr=C3=A9 a ground-breaking achievement in decorati=\nve furniture finishing designed and developed by Sally Sirkin Lewis.\">J. Ro=\nbert Scott announces the introduction of Ombr=C3=A9 a ground-breaking achie=\nvement in decorative furniture finishing designed and developed by Sally Si=\nrkin Lewis.</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">September 24th, 2010 <!-- b=\ny admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p class=3D\"MsoNorma=\nl\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\"><a href=3D\"mailto:jtri=\nolo@jrobertscott.com\"></a>Contact: June Lockhart-Triolo<br />=0AMarketing M=\nanager / Art Director<br />=0AMedia &amp; Marketing Department<br />=0ATel:=\n 310.680.4380<br />=0AFax: 310.680.4323<br />=0A<a href=3D\"mailto:jtriolo@j=\nrobertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" =\nstyle=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</p>=\n=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\"=\n>J. ROBERT SCOTT INTRODUCES OMBR=C3=89</p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=\n=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">Los Angeles, California =E2=80=\n=93 September, 2010 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known luxury =\nfurniture and textile manufacturer announces the introduction of Ombr=C3=A9=\n, a ground-breaking achievement in decorative furniture finishing.=C2=A0</p>=\n=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\"=\n>After three years of development, the company, under the leadership of Pre=\nsident, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis <a href=3D\"ht=\ntp://www.architecturaldigest.com/architects/100/sally_lewis/sally_lewis_pro=\nfile\">http://www.architecturaldigest.com/architects/100/sally_lewis/sally_l=\newis_profile</a><br />=0Aunveils the proprietary finishing technique on sel=\nected new designs.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CI was intrigued by the transparent effect=\n of watercolors, and I wanted to translate the concept of a seamless color =\ntransition to wood veneer,=E2=80=9D explains Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 The resulting=\n finishes exhibit subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dar=\nk, producing a distinctive, individual effect on each veneer.</p>=0A<p clas=\ns=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">In French=\n, the word ombr=C3=A9 means shadow or shade.=C2=A0 The term, ombr=C3=A9 is =\ncommonly used in the field of textiles to refer to a color effect that is g=\nenerally produced by arranging different tones of threads or fibers in the =\nwarp of a woven fabric.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN:=\n 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative conc=\nept has never been attempted as a decorative furniture finish, and marks a =\nmilestone in the design field.=C2=A0 The proprietary technique offered in D=\naybreak Ombr=C3=A9=E2=84=A2, Twilight Ombr=C3=A9=E2=84=A2, Mist Ombr=C3=A9=\n=E2=84=A2 and Storm Ombr=C3=A9=E2=84=A2 finishes, result in one-of-a-kind e=\nxamples of Furniture as Art.=C2=A0 A=C2=A0 Utility Patent has been filed wi=\nth the United States Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://www.usp=\nto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MA=\nRGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: 170.0pt\">For additional company and product i=\nnformation, please visit <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com\">www.jrober=\ntscott.com</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; t=\nab-stops: 170.0pt\">Digital Images Available upon Request<br />=0APlease con=\ntact June Lockhart =E2=80=93Triolo <a href=3D\"mailto:jtriolo@jrobertscott.c=\nom\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"text=\n-align: center;\">=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=\n=3D\"text-align: center;\">=C2=A0</p>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-w=\neight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></di=\nv>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-b=\nidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bi=\ndi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></st=\nrong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=\n=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"><span style=3D\"font-size: 10pt; f=\nont-family: Garamond;\"></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\">=0A<div><str=\nong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style=\n: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight=\n: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A=\n<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-f=\nont-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-fo=\nnt-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong>=\n</div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"m=\nso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"ms=\no-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em>=\n</strong></div>=0A<div><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em s=\ntyle=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<div><strong st=\nyle=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: norm=\nal\"></em></strong></div>=0A<p><strong style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal=\n\"><em style=3D\"mso-bidi-font-style: normal\"><span style=3D\"font-size: 10pt;=\n font-family: Garamond;\"></p>=0A<p class=3D\"MsoNormal\" style=3D\"margin: 0in=\n 0in 0pt; Video</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">March 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --=\n></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" heigh=\nt=3D\"360\" src=3D\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0=\n\" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\n=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-=\nlogo-websize1.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1213\" title=\n=3D\"indigo-fab-logo-websize1\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-co=\nntent/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" =\nheight=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<=\np>Indigo is a natural dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. Marco P=\nolo described the indigo industry in the 13th Century during his exploratio=\nn of Western Asia and India. The powerful dye, from the leaves of the indig=\no herb, was a valuable commodity to Europeans, along with coarse spices lik=\ne pepper, ginger and cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisione=\nd by Sally Sirkin Lewis, is a refined selection of 10 luxury textiles in th=\ne deep inky &#8220;mood&#8221; of Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualiti=\nes of 100% hand-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"fon=\nt-family: Symbol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-=\nfamily: 'Times New Roman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: S=\nymbol;\"><span style=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbo=\nl;\">=C3=A4</span></span>, and the romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The v=\nersatility of the Indigo color palette and the fabric qualities offered in =\nthis collection align beautifully with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and th=\ne company&#8217;s commitment to exceptional quality. The Indigo Collection =\nis suitable for residential, hospitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=\n=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>=\nTags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"ta=\ng\">Fabrics</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" =\nrel=3D\"tag\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3D=\nj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. class=3D\"byline\">January 18th, 201=\n2 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h2 style=3D=\n\"text-align: center;\">United States Design Patent D650,608<br />=0AJ Robert=\n Scott=C2=A0Cabriole Cabinet=C2=A0Designed by Sally Sirkin Lewis.</p>=0A<p>=\n<a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabr=\niole-web.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"c=\nabriole-web\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/201=\n2/01/cabriole-web.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"354\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></h2>=0A=\n<h3 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">Sally Sirkin Lewis Adds New U.S. Design P=\natent</h3>=0A<p>Los Angeles, California =E2=80=93 January 2012 J. Robert Sc=\nott, Inc. the internationally known, American luxury furniture and textiles=\n manufacturer announces that the United States Patent Office has issued a D=\nesign Patent to designer Sally Sirkin Lewis for her Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0=\n</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott, under the leadership of President, Founder and H=\nall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduced the Cabriole Cabinet in=\n fall 2010 as part of the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection, so named from the French w=\nord meaning shadow or shade.=C2=A0 The dramatic 72=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall ca=\nbinet is shown in excelsior veneer, with Ombr=C3=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=\n=C2=A0 The proprietary finishing technique exhibits subtle gradients in int=\nensity and shade from light to dark, producing a distinctive, individual ef=\nfect on each wood veneer.=C2=A0 J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative concep=\nt is a design milestone in decorative furniture finishing, and each piece i=\nn the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection is signed and dated by the designer.=C2=A0 A Ut=\nility Patent has been filed with the United States Patent and Trademark Off=\nice. <a href=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>F=\nor the past four decades Ms. Lewis, through her company has distinguished h=\nerself as a pioneer in the design field and a leading source of originality=\n in American furniture manufacturing.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CWe are very proud of t=\nhe furniture we make, in both quality and style, our products are proof tha=\nt good design is timeless,=E2=80=9D says Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a tim=\ne when people are suddenly sensitive to the origin of the products in their=\n homes, I think it is important to note that J. Robert Scott furniture has =\nalways been Made in America,=E2=80=9D she adds.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<=\ndiv class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsc=\nott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott =\nRenews Lease of California Oak Street Facility\">J. Robert Scott Renews Leas=\ne of California Oak Street Facility</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">Jan=\nuary 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t=\n\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" class=3D\"dn_post\">=0A<p>The internationally known=\n luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsc=\nott.com/index.html\">J. Robert Scott, Inc.</a> announces the extension of th=\ne lease on its manufacturing facility in Inglewood, California, for more th=\nan six years.</p>=0A<p>The company occupies more than 76,000 square feet of=\n industrial space in the Airport Business Park located at 500 North Oak Str=\neet where all facets of furniture production take place. The facility serve=\ns as corporate headquarters for research and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=\n=80=9CThe proximity of the design team to production and manufacturing give=\ns us the opportunity to follow products day to day, from prototype through =\nto finished piece, and to observe the birth of new designs as they material=\nize in the hands of our talented artisans,=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Of=\nficer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=80=9CAs a small organization, this instant a=\nccess is very supportive of open communication between all divisions.&#8221=\n;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in Los Angeles by =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D=\n designer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirk=\nin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott was born out of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=\n=80=9CProvide her clients with contemporary, well-made furnishings&#8221; t=\nhat met her uncompromising standards of quality and beauty. Her understated=\n signature style has becomes known as =E2=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; ac=\ncording to the company=E2=80=99s web site.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the c=\nompany currently employs 125 seasoned craftspeople in various disciplines, =\nincluding designers, customer service, and office staff.=C2=A0Many of J. Ro=\nbert Scott=E2=80=99s employees have been with the company for decades.</p>=\n=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dinterio=\nr-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior desgin</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsco=\ntt.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. text-align: left; tab=\n-stops: 170.0pt;\"><span style=3D\"font-size: small; font-family: Garamond;\">=\n<span style=3D\"font-size: small; font-family: Garamond;\">Contact: June Lock=\nhart-Triolo<br />=0AMarketing Manager / Art Director<br />=0AMedia &amp; Ma=\nrketing Department<br />=0ATel: 310.680.4380<br />=0AFax: 310.680.4323<br />=\n=0A<a href=3D\"jtriolo@jrobertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></span>=\n</span></p>=0A<p>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: left;\"=\n>=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=\n=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=\n=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 SALLY SIRKI=\nN LEWIS RECOGNIZED AMONG 50 TITANS OF DESIGN</p>=0A<p>Los Angeles, Californ=\nia - Sally Sirkin Lewis, president and founder of J. Robert Scott is recogn=\nized as one of the 50 Titans of Design by the Los Angeles Times. The May 1s=\nt edition of the Los Angeles Times Magazine selected &#8220;classic works b=\ny the trailblazers, past and present, who shaped the form and spirit of Sou=\nthern California&#8221;. Ms. Lewis is in the company of design giants from =\narchitecture such as Schindler, Lautner, Neutra, Gehry, and legendary furni=\nture designers like Charles &amp; Ray Eames, Maloof, and Frankl.</p>=0A<p>T=\no exemplify Ms. Lewis&#8217; design style, The Los Angeles Times selected a=\n Louis XVI Fauteuil which, as interpreted by the designer in 1978, was upho=\nlstered in zebra skin. As the first woman to open a showroom on Melrose Ave=\nnue in the design district in 1972, Ms. Lewis has continually evolved her d=\nesign ethos, and challenged the standards of furniture manufacturing. Most =\nrecently Ms. Lewis developed a revolutionary finishing process which she na=\nmed Ombr=C3=A9, a proprietary technique that captures the gradient effect o=\nf color in textiles, and translates the concept to wood veneers. Sally Sirk=\nin Lewis, like the visionary counterparts listed in the L.A. Times feature,=\n continues to inspire the design community, and many others who simply appr=\neciate beauty.</p>=0A<p>For additional company and product information, ple=\nase visit <a href=3D\"www.jrobertscott.com\">www.jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<=\np>Digital Images Available upon Request<br />=0APlease contact June Lockhar=\nt -Triolo <a -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin: prototypes body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<d=\niv id=3D\"prototypesBody\">=0A=0A\t=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div c=\nlass=3D\"alignleft\">&laquo; <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=\n=3D1179\">US Design Patent D650,608</a></div>=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"=\n><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1219\">Pictures from Londo=\nn Design Week 2012</a> &raquo;</div>=0A\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"post\" =\nid=3D\"post-1212\">=0A\t\t\t<h2>J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Collection Video</=\nh2>=0A\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">March 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t=\n\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\" src=\n=3D\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfullsc=\nreen></iframe></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www=\n.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.=\njpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo-fab=\n-logo-websize1\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/=\n2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"500\"=\n /></a></p>=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo is a =\nnatural dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo described =\nthe indigo industry in the 13th Century during his exploration of Western A=\nsia and India. The powerful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, was a =\nvaluable commodity to Europeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, ging=\ner and cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally Sir=\nkin Lewis, is a refined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep inky &#=\n8220;mood&#8221; of Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100% han=\nd-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: Symb=\nol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'Times=\n New Roman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><span =\nstyle=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4</sp=\nan></span>, and the romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility of =\nthe Indigo color palette and the fabric qualities offered in this collectio=\nn align beautifully with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&#821=\n7;s commitment to exceptional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitable fo=\nr residential, hospitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=\n=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Df=\nabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blo=\ng/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott=\n.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>, =\n<a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxu=\nry</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-lew=\nis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.=\ncom/blog/?tag=3Dtextiles\" rel=3D\"tag\">Textiles</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"=\npostmetadata alt\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><small>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\tThis entry was posted=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t=\n\t\t\t\t\t\ton Friday, March 9th, 2012 at 1:50 am\t\t\t\t\t\tand is filed under <a responses to this entry through the <a href=3D'http://www=\n.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2&amp;p=3D1212'>RSS 2.0</a> feed.=0A=0A\t\t=\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tYou can <a href=3D\"#respond\">leave a 2009</a><=\n/li>=0A\t<li><a href=3D'http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?m=3D200905' title=\n=3D'May 2009'>May 2009</a></li>=0A\t<li><a href=3D'http://www.jrobertscott.c=\nom/blog/?m=3D200904' title=3D'April 2009'>April 2009</a></li>=0A\t<li><a hre=\nf=3D'http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?m=3D200903' title=3D'March 2009'>Mar=\nch 2009</a></li>=0A\t<li><a href=3D'http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?m=3D20=\n0902' title=3D'February 2009'>February 2009</a></li>=0A\t<li><a href=3D'http=\n://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?m=3D200901' title=3D'January 2009'>January 20=\n09</a></li>=0A\t\t\t\t</ul>=0A\t\t\t</li>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t</ul>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<br class=3D\"clea=\nr\"/>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: prototypes sidebar -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- b=\negin: prototypes body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"prototypesBody\">=0A=0A\t\t=0A \t   =\n\t  \t\t<h2 class=3D\"pagetitle\">Posts Tagged &#8216;Fabrics&#8217;</h2>=0A \t  =\n=0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignleft\"></div>=0A\t=\n\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"></div>=0A\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\">=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1212\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=\n=3D1212\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to J Robert Scott Indigo =\nTextile Collection Video\">J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Collection Video</a=\n></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">March 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\"=\n src=3D\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfu=\nllscreen></iframe></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http:/=\n/www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websi=\nze1.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo=\n-fab-logo-websize1\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uplo=\nads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"=\n500\" /></a></p>=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo i=\ns a natural dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo descri=\nbed the indigo industry in the 13th Century during his exploration of Weste=\nrn Asia and India. The powerful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, wa=\ns a valuable commodity to Europeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, =\nginger and cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally=\n Sirkin Lewis, is a refined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep ink=\ny &#8220;mood&#8221; of Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100%=\n hand-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: =\nSymbol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'T=\nimes New Roman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><s=\npan style=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4=\n</span></span>, and the romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility=\n of the Indigo color palette and the fabric qualities offered in this colle=\nction align beautifully with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&=\n#8217;s commitment to exceptional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitabl=\ne for residential, hospitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></d=\niv>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a h=\nref=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics=\n</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag=\n\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-s=\ncott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobe=\nrtscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://w=\nww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirki=\nn Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dtextiles\" r=\nel=3D\"tag\">Textiles</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.=\ncom/blog/?cat=3D146\" title=3D\"View all posts in News, Events, Etc...\" rel=\n=3D\"category\">News, Events, Etc...</a> |   <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsco=\ntt.com/blog/?p=3D1212#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on J Robert Scott Indigo Te=\nxtile Collection Video\">No Comments &#187;</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"share=\n\" -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- b=\negin: prototypes body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"prototypesBody\">=0A=0A\t\t=0A \t   =\n\t  \t\t<h2 class=3D\"pagetitle\">Posts Tagged &#8216;Indigo&#8217;</h2>=0A \t  =\n=0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignleft\"></div>=0A\t=\n\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"></div>=0A\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\">=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1212\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=\n=3D1212\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to J Robert Scott Indigo =\nTextile Collection Video\">J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Collection Video</a=\n></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">March 9th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p><iframe width=3D\"640\" height=3D\"360\"=\n src=3D\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/MAPM-v8fAnA\" frameborder=3D\"0\" allowfu=\nllscreen></iframe></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http:/=\n/www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websi=\nze1.jpg\"><img class=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1213\" title=3D\"indigo=\n-fab-logo-websize1\" src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uplo=\nads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"=\n500\" /></a></p>=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo i=\ns a natural dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo descri=\nbed the indigo industry in the 13th Century during his exploration of Weste=\nrn Asia and India. The powerful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, wa=\ns a valuable commodity to Europeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, =\nginger and cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally=\n Sirkin Lewis, is a refined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep ink=\ny &#8220;mood&#8221; of Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100%=\n hand-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: =\nSymbol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'T=\nimes New Roman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><s=\npan style=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4=\n</span></span>, and the romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility=\n of the Indigo color palette and the fabric qualities offered in this colle=\nction align beautifully with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&=\n#8217;s commitment to exceptional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitabl=\ne for residential, hospitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></d=\niv>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a h=\nref=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics=\n</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag=\n\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-s=\ncott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobe=\nrtscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://w=\nww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirki=\nn Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dtextiles\" r=\nel=3D\"tag\">Textiles</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.=\ncom/blog/?cat=3D146\" title=3D\"View all posts in News, Events, Etc...\" rel=\n=3D\"category\">News, Events, Etc...</a> |   <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsco=\ntt.com/blog/?p=3D1212#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on J Robert Scott Indigo Te=\nxtile Collection Video\">No Comments &#187;</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"share=\n\" href=3D\"javascript:;\" title=3D\"J Robert Scott Indigo Textile Collection V=\nideo\" rel=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1212\" onclick=3D\"xhtml.s=\nhareOpen(this);\">Share This</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a class=3D\"comment\" href=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1212#respond\">Add a Comment</a>=0A\t\t\t\t\t<a cl=\nass=3D\"rss\" href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t=\n\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div c=\nlass=3D\"alignleft\"></div>=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"></div>=0A\t\t</div>=\n=0A=0A\t=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- end: prototypes body -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<br cl=\nass=3D\"clear\"/>=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A\t\t\t<!-- end: prototypes content -->=0A=0A\t\t</=\ndiv>=0A\t\t<!-- end: CONTENT -->=0A=0A\t\t<!-- begin: FOOTER -->=0A\t\t<div id=3D=\n\"globalFooter\">=0A\t\t\t<p>&copy; 2012 J. src=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uplo=\nads/2012/03/indigo-fab-logo-websize1.jpg\" alt=3D\"\" width=3D\"318\" height=3D\"=\n500\" /></a></p>=0A<div class=3D\"description\">=0A<p>=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>Indigo i=\ns a natural dye that can be traced back to ancient Egypt. Marco Polo descri=\nbed the indigo industry in the 13th Century during his exploration of Weste=\nrn Asia and India. The powerful dye, from the leaves of the indigo herb, wa=\ns a valuable commodity to Europeans, along with coarse spices like pepper, =\nginger and cinnamon.</p>=0A<p>The Indigo Collection, as envisioned by Sally=\n Sirkin Lewis, is a refined selection of 10 luxury textiles in the deep ink=\ny &#8220;mood&#8221; of Indigo. The collection includes 4 qualities of 100%=\n hand-woven silk, silk mohair, JRS Superkidskin<span style=3D\"font-family: =\nSymbol; mso-ascii-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-hansi-font-family: 'T=\nimes New Roman'; mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\"><s=\npan style=3D\"mso-char-type: symbol; mso-symbol-font-family: Symbol;\">=C3=A4=\n</span></span>, and the romantic Edwardian Floral.</p>=0A<p>The versatility=\n of the Indigo color palette and the fabric qualities offered in this colle=\nction align beautifully with the J. Robert Scott aesthetic and the company&=\n#8217;s commitment to exceptional quality. The Indigo Collection is suitabl=\ne for residential, hospitality, and yacht interiors.</p>=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></d=\niv>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a h=\nref=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dfabrics\" rel=3D\"tag\">Fabrics=\n</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dindigo\" rel=3D\"tag=\n\">Indigo</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-s=\ncott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirki=\nn Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dtextiles\" r=\nel=3D\"tag\">Textiles</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http:/=\n/www.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\"><im=\ng class=3D\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"cabriole-web\" Sirkin Lewis Adds New U.S. Design Patent</h3>=0A<p>=\nLos Angeles, California =E2=80=93 January 2012 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the in=\nternationally known, American luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer an=\nnounces that the United States Patent Office has issued a Design Patent to =\ndesigner Sally Sirkin Lewis for her Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Rob=\nert Scott, under the leadership of President, Founder and Hall-of-Fame desi=\ngner, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduced the Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as pa=\nrt of the Ombr=C3=A9 Collection, so named from the French word meaning shad=\now or shade.=C2=A0 The dramatic 72=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown i=\nn excelsior veneer, with Ombr=C3=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The propri=\netary finishing technique exhibits subtle gradients in intensity and shade =\nfrom light to dark, producing a distinctive, individual effect on each wood=\n veneer.=C2=A0 J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design mil=\nestone in decorative furniture finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 =\nCollection is signed and dated by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has =\nbeen filed with the United States Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"h=\nttp://www.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four =\ndecades Ms. Lewis, through her company has distinguished herself as a pione=\ner in the design field and a leading source of originality in American furn=\niture manufacturing.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we m=\nake, in both quality and style, our products are proof that good design is =\ntimeless,=E2=80=9D says Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are=\n suddenly sensitive to the origin of the products in their homes, I think i=\nt is important to note that J. Robert Scott furniture has always been Made =\nin America,=E2=80=9D she adds.</p>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert =\nScott Inc.</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" =\nrel=3D\"tag\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3D=\nsally-sirkin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://w=\nww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dunited-states-design-patent\" rel=3D\"tag\">Un=\nited States Design Patent</a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata alt\">=0A=\n\t\t\t\t\t<p><small>=0A\t\t\t\t\t\tThis entry was posted=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\ton Wednesday, J=\nanuary 18th, 2012 at 7:44 pm\t\t\t\t\t\tand is filed under <a Patent&#8217;</h2>=0A \t  =0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t=\n\t<div class=3D\"alignleft\"></div>=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"></div>=0A\t\t=\n</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1179\"><a href=3D\"=\nhttp://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1179\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Perma=\nnent Link to US Design Patent D650,608\">US Design Patent D650,608</a></h2>=\n=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">January 18th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A=\n\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<h2 style=3D\"text-align: center;\">United S=\ntates Design Patent D650,608<br />=0AJ Robert Scott=C2=A0Cabriole Cabinet=\n=C2=A0Designed by Sally Sirkin Lewis.</p>=0A<p><a href=3D\"http://www.jrober=\ntscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\"><img class=3D\"=\naligncenter size-full wp-image-1180\" title=3D\"cabriole-web\" src=3D\"http://w=\nww.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/cabriole-web.jpg\" alt=\n=3D\"\" width=3D\"354\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></h2>=0A<h3 style=3D\"text-align: c=\nenter;\">Sally Sirkin Lewis Adds New U.S. Design Patent</h3>=0A<p>Los Angele=\ns, California =E2=80=93 January 2012 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationa=\nlly known, American luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer announces th=\nat the United States Patent Office has issued a Design Patent to designer S=\nally Sirkin Lewis for her Cabriole Cabinet.=C2=A0</p>=0A<p>J. Robert Scott,=\n under the leadership of President, Founder and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sall=\ny Sirkin Lewis introduced the Cabriole Cabinet in fall 2010 as part of the =\nOmbr=C3=A9 Collection, so named from the French word meaning shadow or shad=\ne.=C2=A0 The dramatic 72=E2=80=9D (183cm) tall cabinet is shown in excelsio=\nr veneer, with Ombr=C3=A9 Storm=E2=84=A2 finish.=C2=A0 The proprietary fini=\nshing technique exhibits subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light=\n to dark, producing a distinctive, individual effect on each wood veneer.=\n=C2=A0 J. Robert Scott=E2=80=99s innovative concept is a design milestone i=\nn decorative furniture finishing, and each piece in the Ombr=C3=A9 Collecti=\non is signed and dated by the designer.=C2=A0 A Utility Patent has been fil=\ned with the United States Patent and Trademark Office. <a href=3D\"http://ww=\nw.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p>For the past four decades =\nMs. Lewis, through her company has distinguished herself as a pioneer in th=\ne design field and a leading source of originality in American furniture ma=\nnufacturing.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CWe are very proud of the furniture we make, in =\nboth quality and style, our products are proof that good design is timeless=\n,=E2=80=9D says Ms. Lewis.=C2=A0 =E2=80=9CAt a time when people are suddenl=\ny sensitive to the origin of the products in their homes, I think it is imp=\nortant to note that J. Robert Scott furniture has always been Made in Ameri=\nca,=E2=80=9D she adds.</p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata=\n\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-rob=\nert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. href=3D\"http://www.jro=\nbertscott.com/blog/?feed=3Drss2\"></a>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t=\n<div class=3D\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1047\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobe=\nrtscott.com/blog/?p=3D1047\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to SAL=\nLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.S. DESIGN PATENT FOR ADELPHI =\nLOUNGE\">SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.S. DESIGN PATENT F=\nOR ADELPHI LOUNGE</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">July 5th, 2011 <!-- b=\ny admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Contact: June Loc=\nkhart-Triolo<br />=0AMarketing Manager / Art Director<br />=0AMedia &amp; M=\narketing Department<br />=0ATel: 310.680.4380<br />=0AFax: 310.680.4323<br =\n/>=0A<a href=3D\"jtriolo@jrobertscott.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=\n=0A<p><strong>FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE</strong></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: =\ncenter;\"><strong>SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. ROBERT SCOTT GRANTED U.S. DESIGN=\n PATENT FOR ADELPHI LOUNGE</strong></p>=0A<p>Los Angeles, California - June=\n 29, 2011 J. Robert Scott, Inc. the internationally known luxury furniture =\nand textile manufacturer announces that the United States Patent Office has=\n issued a design patent for the Adelphi Lounge Chair. (U.S. Design Patent N=\no. D638,229).</p>=0A<p>The company, under the leadership of President, Foun=\nder, and Hall-of-Fame designer, Sally Sirkin Lewis introduced the lounge in=\n 2010. The Adelphi Lounge features a strong angular profile and sweeping cu=\nrvature of the wood frame. The lounge is shown in J. Robert Scott&#8217;s p=\nroprietary Ombr=C3=A9 finishing technique which produces a color transition=\n of subtle gradients in intensity and shade from light to dark. The innovat=\nive Ombr=C3=A9 finish concept results in one-of-a-kind examples of Furnitur=\ne as Art. In addition, a Utility Patent has been filed with the United Stat=\nes Patent and Trademark Office, to safeguard the decorative finish. <a href=\n=3D\"http://www.uspto.gov/\">http://www.uspto.gov/</a></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text=\n-align: left;\">J. Robert Scott has established a rich brand heritage of exc=\nellence and authenticity in the design world, and continues to influence th=\ne community with the development of Ombr=C3=A9 which joins the group of fin=\nish options offered by the company. Each item of furniture finished in the =\nOmbr=C3=A9 technique is signed and dated by designer Sally Sirkin Lewis, fu=\nrther enhancing the collectability of her work in the field. The U.S. Desig=\nn Patent on the Adelphi Lounge joins a long list of Ms. Lewis&#8217; design=\ns that have been granted patents over her nearly 40 year career.</p>=0A<p s=\ntyle=3D\"text-align: left;\">For additional company and product information, =\nplease visit <a href=3D\"www.jrobertscott.com\">www.jrobertscott.com</a></p>=\n=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\">Digital Images Available upon Request<b=\nr />=0APlease contact June Lockhart -Triolo <a href=3D\"jtriolo@jrobertscott=\n.com\">jtriolo@jrobertscott.com</a></p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\">#=\n # #</p>=0A<p style=3D\"text-align: center;\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsc=\nott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/adelphi-lounge.jpg\"><img class=3D\"a=\nligncenter size-full wp-image-1055\" title=3D\"adelphi-lounge\" src=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/adelphi-lounge.jpg\" al=\nt=3D\"\" width=3D\"388\" height=3D\"500\" /></a></p>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div c=\nlass=3D\"postmetadata\">=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.c=\nom/blog/?tag=3Dadelphi\" rel=3D\"tag\">Adelphi</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrob=\nertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott\" rel=3D\"tag\">J Robert Scott</a>, <a=\n href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dlounge\" rel=3D\"tag\">Lounge=\n</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag=\n\">Luxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirk=\nin-lewis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobert=\nscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dunited-states-design-patent\" rel=3D\"tag\">United State=\ns Design Patent</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/=\nblog/?cat=3D41\" title=3D\"View all posts in United States Patents\" rel=3D\"ca=\ntegory\">United States Patents</a> |   <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.co=\nm/blog/?p=3D1047#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on SALLY SIRKIN LEWIS FOR J. -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- begin=\n: prototypes body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"prototypesBody\">=0A=0A\t=0A\t\t<div cla=\nss=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignleft\">&laquo; <a href=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1170\">J Robert Scott Custom Emile Side Table=\n</a></div>=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscot=\nt.com/blog/?p=3D1179\">US Design Patent D650,608</a> &raquo;</div>=0A\t\t</div>=\n=0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"post\" id=3D\"post-1177\">=0A\t\t\t<h2>J. Robert Scott Rene=\nws Lease of California Oak Street Facility</h2>=0A\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">J=\nanuary 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t=\n\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" class=3D\"dn_post\">=0A<p>The internationally known=\n luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsc=\nott.com/index.html\">J. Robert Scott, Inc.</a> announces the extension of th=\ne lease on its manufacturing facility in Inglewood, California, for more th=\nan six years.</p>=0A<p>The company occupies more than 76,000 square feet of=\n industrial space in the Airport Business Park located at 500 North Oak Str=\neet where all facets of furniture production take place. The facility serve=\ns as corporate headquarters for research and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=\n=80=9CThe proximity of the design team to production and manufacturing give=\ns us the opportunity to follow products day to day, from prototype through =\nto finished piece, and to observe the birth of new designs as they material=\nize in the hands of our talented artisans,=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Of=\nficer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=80=9CAs a small organization, this instant a=\nccess is very supportive of open communication between all divisions.&#8221=\n;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in Los Angeles by =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D=\n designer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirk=\nin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott was born out of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=\n=80=9CProvide her clients with contemporary, well-made furnishings&#8221; t=\nhat met her uncompromising standards of quality and beauty. Her understated=\n signature style has becomes known as =E2=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; ac=\ncording to the company=E2=80=99s web site.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the c=\nompany currently employs 125 seasoned craftspeople in various disciplines, =\nincluding designers, customer service, and office staff.=C2=A0Many of J. Ro=\nbert Scott=E2=80=99s employees have been with the company for decades.</p>=\n=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jroberts=\ncott.com/blog/?tag=3Dinterior-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior desgin</a>, <a h=\nref=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"t=\nag\">J. -->=0A=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<!-- b=\negin: prototypes body -->=0A\t\t\t\t<div id=3D\"prototypesBody\">=0A=0A\t\t=0A \t   =\n\t  \t\t<h2 class=3D\"pagetitle\">Posts Tagged &#8216;interior desgin&#8217;</h2>=\n=0A \t  =0A=0A\t\t<div class=3D\"navigation\">=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignleft\"></d=\niv>=0A\t\t\t<div class=3D\"alignright\"></div>=0A\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D=\n\"post\">=0A\t\t\t\t<h2 id=3D\"post-1177\"><a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/b=\nlog/?p=3D1177\" rel=3D\"bookmark\" title=3D\"Permanent Link to J. Robert Scott =\nRenews Lease of California Oak Street Facility\">J. Robert Scott Renews Leas=\ne of California Oak Street Facility</a></h2>=0A\t\t\t\t<h3 class=3D\"byline\">Jan=\nuary 5th, 2012 <!-- by admin --></h3>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"entry\">=0A\t\t\t\t=\n\t<div id=3D\"article_post\" class=3D\"dn_post\">=0A<p>The internationally known=\n luxury furniture and textiles manufacturer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsc=\nott.com/index.html\">J. Robert Scott, Inc.</a> announces the extension of th=\ne lease on its manufacturing facility in Inglewood, California, for more th=\nan six years.</p>=0A<p>The company occupies more than 76,000 square feet of=\n industrial space in the Airport Business Park located at 500 North Oak Str=\neet where all facets of furniture production take place. The facility serve=\ns as corporate headquarters for research and design as well.</p>=0A<p>=E2=\n=80=9CThe proximity of the design team to production and manufacturing give=\ns us the opportunity to follow products day to day, from prototype through =\nto finished piece, and to observe the birth of new designs as they material=\nize in the hands of our talented artisans,=E2=80=9D says Chief Operating Of=\nficer Richard I. Chilcott. =E2=80=9CAs a small organization, this instant a=\nccess is very supportive of open communication between all divisions.&#8221=\n;</p>=0A<p>Founded in 1972 in Los Angeles by =E2=80=9CHall of Fame=E2=80=9D=\n designer <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/about.html#jrs\">Sally Sirk=\nin Lewis</a>, J. Robert Scott was born out of Lewis=E2=80=99 desire to =E2=\n=80=9CProvide her clients with contemporary, well-made furnishings&#8221; t=\nhat met her uncompromising standards of quality and beauty. Her understated=\n signature style has becomes known as =E2=80=9CCalifornia Design,&#8221; ac=\ncording to the company=E2=80=99s web site.</p>=0A<p>In this location, the c=\nompany currently employs 125 seasoned craftspeople in various disciplines, =\nincluding designers, customer service, and office staff.=C2=A0Many of J. Ro=\nbert Scott=E2=80=99s employees have been with the company for decades.</p>=\n=0A<p>=C2=A0</p></div>=0A\t\t\t\t</div>=0A=0A\t\t\t\t<div class=3D\"postmetadata\">=\n=0A\t\t\t\t\t<p>Tags: <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dinterio=\nr-desgin\" rel=3D\"tag\">interior desgin</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertsco=\ntt.com/blog/?tag=3Dj-robert-scott-inc\" rel=3D\"tag\">J. Robert Scott Inc.</a>=\n, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dluxury\" rel=3D\"tag\">Lu=\nxury</a>, <a href=3D\"http://www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?tag=3Dsally-sirkin-l=\newis\" rel=3D\"tag\">Sally Sirkin Lewis</a><br /> Posted in <a href=3D\"http://=\nwww.jrobertscott.com/blog/?cat=3D146\" title=3D\"View all posts in News, Even=\nts, Etc...\" rel=3D\"category\">News, Events, Etc...</a> |   <a href=3D\"http:/=\n/www.jrobertscott.com/blog/?p=3D1177#respond\" title=3D\"Comment on J. S. Design =\nPatents.
